characters: THE OTHERS LANDS WITH JARRING FORCE
WE CUT BACK AND FORTH FROM THE OLD
MARY ANNE IS ON HER FEET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Light heavyweight champion DANNY "STUNTMAN" WHEELER charg at ADONIS - Straight aggression, PERSONAL. The CROWD goes crazy! ADONIS quickly SIDE STEPS and counters with a BLISTERING right, left upper-cut and two more rights.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Wheeler's stunned early!

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: He's really rocked! ADONIS pours it on! THE CROWD ROARS LOUDER!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BIANCA, who is 5 MONTHS PREGNANT, jumps to her feet, applauding wildly.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: Go, D - Keep going!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADONIS pounds away with amazing fury. It is a human machi gun!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANTHONY, mesmerized, leans forward. (We will meet up and learn more about him soon.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADONIS takes the counter flush and COUNTERPUNCHES, overwhelming WHEELER with 15 UNANSWERED PUNCHES!!

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Wheeler connects then - Oh, he is countered!! And badly wobbled - This is so unexpected!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wheeler's trainer, LIL DUKE, screams for his hurt man to fight back!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROCKY on his feet.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Stay on it! Body, head! Body, head!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dubious boxing promoter, BUDDY "KING" CHARLES eyes the ev taking in the crowd's energy, loving it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHEELER struggles forward but is BOMBARDED and terribly C

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Wheeler attempts to get off the ropes and is hit again and cut! That's a deep gash!! BLOOD pours down at a sickening pace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BIANCA'S HEARING AID sharply dips in SOUND as the thunder AUDIENCE fades drastically. Her eyes show concern as she continues to cheer ADONIS on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADONIS catches WHEELER with a PERFECTLY STRAIGHT right an the CHAMP is dropped. ADONIS goes to a neutral corner.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Wheeler has been known to cut but this is surgery - Down goes Wheeler!!

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: What a beautifully timed right cross - Picture perfect!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BUDDY "KING" CHARLES has seen enough and exits.

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY
dialogues.text: (to bodyguard) ++. It's done.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The GASH is bad, very nasty. The RING DOCTOR turns to the referee.  REFEREE waves his arms! "STUNTMAN" WHEELER, distraught, pounds the ring pad. INCONSOLABLE.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: That's it!! It's over!! Adonis Creed is the new Light Heavyweight Champion of the World!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROCKY and CORNER pour in. BIANCA climbs into the ring and hugs ADONIS. ADONIS goes over to WHEELER and gives him a sportsman-lik pat on the shoulder. ADONIS faces LIL DUKE, Wheeler's trainer.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Sorry, man -

dialogues.speaker: LIL DUKE
dialogues.text: Ain't nothing to be sorry ‘bout - That's fightin' - You were great, your pops is smilin' - Yo, I'll get ya ‘Stang back. ADONIS smiles, moves to the corner and greets ROCKY and BIANCA, HUGGING them both.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: Oh, baby, I am so proud of you! My God, you're all good?

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: »..- All good. ROCKY smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seated in the cheaper seats ANTHONY applauds and glances around at the hero worshipping crowd.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARY ANNE CREED looks incredibly relieved as she applauds

dialogues.speaker: ANNOUNCER
dialogues.text: - Winner by Technical Knockout and now, new Light Heavyweight Champion of the World, Adonis Creed!! COMMENTATOR #2 stands center ring with ADONIS, ROCKY and BIANCA. ADONIS has never smiled so broadly.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Well, Adonis, it wasn't an epic battle, but it was a hell of a beat down - This is the first time, at least in the heavier divisions, that there has ever been father and son undisputed title holders - Your thoughts?

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: I'm blessed with really good people around me - You came to see fighting and that's what you always get with me and more!

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Now what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROCKY has a little bag with him, all his fight corner stu swabs, gels. Tape. ADONIS and BIANCA walk about twenty feet ahead of him. ROCKY pauses in front of: WHEELER'S DRESSING ROOM. WHEELER sits COMPLETELY ALONE on a metal folding chair, e red, tearing. A sad sight. NO MUSIC. NO REVELERS. He's ALL ALONE except for LIL DUKE who packs equipment up. ADONIS steps into view...

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: ++. C'mon, what's up? ROCKY and WHEELER make eye contact. ROCKY knows all to we this special pain. He gives a sympathetic nod. ADONIS is effected by the bleak realities of the dark side of this sport. They move off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A huge suite back at the MGM GRAND. An ICE SCULPTURE made the name "Creed". The PARTY is in full swing. MUSIC. Girl Food. They cheer when ADONIS enters the room. ROCKY smile Pulls him close.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: You earned it, kid. Everywhere ADONIS moves, someone has their hands out, as reaching for the hem of his garment. We hear SNIPPETS of overlapping conversation like:

dialogues.speaker: PRODUCER
dialogues.text: When you get to LA, I gotta hook you up with - Very attractive GIRLS give very suggestive looks as ADONI passes through the well-wishers. FLASHES go off as people take selfies. Some make SNAPS. I a frenzy. ROCKY stands in the corner. PEOPLE around him taking self ADONIS poses for a selfie with a few HIGH END FANS. He se MAN (ANTHONY), ten years his senior, staring at him.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: (to Bianca) Be right back.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: Who's that?

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: My brother. ROCKY looks over and notices BIANCA'S confused expression

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: Anthony?

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Be right back. ADONIS nods and moves off. This is unexpectedly emotional ROCKY goes to BIANCA, they talk. ADONIS goes up to his BROTHER.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: (energetic) You looked great, brother, like our Pops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Didn't expect to see you, Anthony.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: Well, I was around an' it's ‘bout time... We're blood and you've done something great tonight and I've been acting the fool too long - I'm real with that, I just had to get over "myself" - Hasn't been easy for me, man, the better you do, the worse I felt about myself. It's tough for an older brother to feel like the younger brother, know what I'm saying?

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Mom know you're here?

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: "Course, she wants this, too - Look, man, I'm sorry for the ego bullshit, it's over, right, I just want to be part of it again, part of where you're going, and I bring something to the party, I've got angles and ideas. You want me around? Last time I looked, there ain't many Creeds left. ADONIS studies his BROTHER'S almost pleading expression a they shake. BIANCA sees the BROTHERS approach.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Bianca, this is Anthony.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: Hey, heard a lot about you.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: (smiles) And my "Unc", Rocky, who helps get me through this. ANTHONY is a little COOL with ROCKY.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: What's up?

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: Do you want to go?

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Oh, yeah. Catch up with y'all later.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you, brother. They move off. ANTHONY and ROCKY lock eyes.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Remember me? Met me and my sister a long time back at Pops funeral. Our sister passed a few years back, only me and him now - So you the "White Daddy" runnin' the show?

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: (offended) Nobody runs nothin' - Yo, where were you when he needed somebody?

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: (indignant) - No offense, but we're real blood, you're not - (moves off) Stallion, thanks for taking better care of him than ya did our Pops... ANTHONY walks off into the crowd.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Floor to ceiling windows, with an expansive view of the L Vegas Strip.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: It's a madhouse out there.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Crazy, right? Let ‘em enjoy it. My victory's right here.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: Your brother just shows up -

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Yeah, but hold that conversation later, it's our time. They share a kiss. She looks around the room. There's a r service table with a CHAMPAGNE BUCKET in the middle.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Look inside. BIANCA sees TWO PINTS of ICE CREAM inside the bucket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where'd that come from? ADONIS sits on the bed. Takes his shirt off. Exhausted. Bianca sits next to him. She takes the chocolate ice crea with her.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: Babe. How do you feel?

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: Like "Champion of the world"? ADONIS smiles.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: (tongue in cheek) Nah, I feel empty and sad inside. ADONIS looks at her and leans back.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: So could ya feed the champ some ice cream? BIANCA looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: Excuse me?

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: C'mon, I've had a rough night.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: (smiles) I had a "rougher" night than you had tonight.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: -.. There's injuries everywhere.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: Sure there are.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: C'mon, can't you feed your man some ice cream?

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: Why don't you get one of those bimbos out there to do that?  10.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: That ice cream looks very good - Gonna melt soon. BIANCA shakes her head and opens the pint. She covers her mouth. Stuck in the center of the ice cream is a 5 carat DIAMOND RING.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: Oh my God! ADONIS smiles.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Donnie. ADONIS takes the ring out of the ice cream and gets on on knee.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Bianca -

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: --. Yes. BIANCA smiles. Tears in her eyes.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: ++. Love you, baby, more every minute.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A dank, cold night on the outskirts of the city. A DARK SEDAN pulls up to a low-level FIGHT CLUB. Out of the car steps fight promoter BUDDY "KING" CHARLES his BODYGUARD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BUDDY is guided past the dank rooms and cubbyholes that s as places for fighters to get ready for their matches... Depressing as it gets. BUDDY passes a half dozen BRAWLERS different weights. None are special. A GYM RAT converses BUDDY and points to a room at the end of the corridor. BUDDY approaches a HULKING FIGURE with sharp features standing in the shadows. The BIG MAN studies another LARG YOUNG MAN with a menacing aura, in boxing garb, facing aw warming up in the corner.  11.

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY
dialogues.text: Ivan Arloff? DRAGO ignores the well-dressed entrepreneur.

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO
dialogues.text: ».. Who are you?

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY
dialogues.text: I have a business proposition might be interested in.

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO
dialogues.text: Who are you?

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY
dialogues.text: Buddy "King" Charles, boxing promotions. I'd like to think there's a great opportunity for you both to capitalize on the Drago name that you and your son haven't used for years.

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO
dialogues.text: What are you talking about?

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY
dialogues.text: About you and your name. The YOUNG FIGHTER continues to warm up, ignoring them.

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I know your history, the "history" with that family and I know the public likes a great story and great stories sell, very simple - DRAGO looks hard at him.

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You were used, you took the blame for a man's death when it wasn't your fault - You basically were thrown out of your country after you gave everything you were asked to give, ashamed to even use your real name and he, whose real name is not even Creed, gets glory.

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO
dialogues.text: (dryly) Feel sorry for me?  12.

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY
dialogues.text: Of course I do. A man only has his pride to stand on and I think it's time for you to get a little payback - Why should Adonis Creed come out of nowhere and get all the acclaim and respect when you and your son get none? Your son is tough, I followed his record, tough fights but no promotion leads no where. He should be where Creed is, not here, but on a world stage. Your son in the ring with the son of Apollo Creed is more than boxing, it's an event! Take your name back - Creed did, now it's your time to take back what you lost. What goes around, comes around. This is an event... A life changer. DRAGO glares at him.

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO
dialogues.text: Nothin' will change my life - Maybe his.

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY
dialogues.text: Vitor "Drago" - You want to do this? VITOR ignores him and exits, heading to the ring.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BELL RINGS. BUDDY "KING" CHARLES watches VITOR DRAGO rapi charge forward and unleash a SAVAGE KICKBOXING beating on MIDDLE EASTERN OPPONENT. The low life CROWD screams for blood. It's FERAL ASSAULT. VITOR is a vicious predator. BUDDY has never seen such FEROCITY. BONE CRUSHING COMBINATIONS batter the opponent helplessly the fitly canvas... VITOR mocks the fallen opponent. BUDDY glances at DRAGO and locks eyes with him. BUDDY's f a gold mine. VITOR exits and speaks as he passes the promoter.

dialogues.speaker: VITOR
dialogues.text: (to Buddy) Let's do this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The DOOR opens and ADONIS, BIANCA, ANTHONY and ROCKY down.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Hey, Cali. ADONIS turns to BIANCA.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You sure you don't want me to drop you off? BIANCA looks at ADONIS.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: No, I want them to see and hear me for me. Not you.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: All right, you go - I'm not, throwin' shade on you. ROCKY picks up his bag.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Coming with us, Unc?

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Nah - I gotta few things to do. ADONIS nods.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Cool - Come by the house for dinner? He's got the address.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Sure, kid. An ESCALADE pulls up for ADONIS and ANTHONY. Another Bianca and another one for ROCKY.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I coulda grabbed a cab.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: It's Uber. No one takes cabs anymore.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: See ya's later. ADONIS shields his eyes as he looks at BIANCA. 13. step one for  14.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Can't see you with all that bling. BIANCA laughs and gets in the car. ANTHONY and ADONIS get their SUV. All pull off in different directions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADONIS and ANTHONY walk inside the large building people Hollywood call The Death Star.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A beautiful view of Century City and a long ass marble ta with bottles of FIJI and FOLDERS that say CREED INC. TREV and JELANI, two handsome, well dressed AGENTS work their magic.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Nike, we can re-negotiate. Under Armour wants to do business in a major way.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: And Reebok and Adidas don't even do boxing and they just want you too, right?

dialogues.speaker: JELANI
dialogues.text: True.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Sounds good - Creed, Inc. Gyms - 24- Hour Fitness situations, explore that? (to Anthony) You, too.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: We'll explore it. Oh, yeah - Ever think about investing in an app?

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: That Silicon money is serious, brother. ADONIS smiles.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: I've thought of a lot of things - I'm gonna have my brother get involved in the day-to-day operations, so when something has potential, reach out to him. (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I have three fights I want, including the rematch, which won't be a long way off - And I've got a lot on my mind and I think it's relatable, so I want to get involved in public speaking, online education - I want to get a message out, goals and dignity and how to pursue both - Sound like a mouthful but I mean it. First topic: "Life's a fight everyone has to fight." While he speaks, we see ANTHONY'S eyes flash with envy.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: (laughs) When are you going to sleep?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're outside the offices of what has become the world's largest record company.

dialogues.speaker: AVA FISHER, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Your voice is sexy - It pulls you in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BIANCA is sitting across from AVA FISHER, a record execut Two ASSISTANTS are present. BIANCA'S MUSIC is playing. Her newest composition. Everyo is liking it a great deal. AVA smiles at her ASSISTANTS, nod back. BIANCA looks encouraged. The song is wonderful loud. The SOUND begins to FADE in BIANCA'S EARS. She subtly tou her hidden HEARING AIDS. The music gets lower and she tri to SUPPRESS her fear. Her nails dig into her palms. The SOUND slowly begins to ebb back and BIANCA puts on a brave face. The music ends and so does the emotional roll coaster.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: You want to sign me?

dialogues.speaker: AVA FISHER
dialogues.text: I don't do general meetings, I only do business and we want to be in business with you, love that Philly thing you got going - Sexy. BIANCA is silent.  16.

dialogues.speaker: AVA FISHER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You're not excited.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: I am - Excuse me. She nonchalantly removes one of her hearing aids.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: "Show time" - The battery's dying - I don't hide it, I just deal with it - AVA and the JUNIOR EXECS are taken aback. BIANCA begins t insert the battery.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I could feel them going down in Vegas. The higher frequencies are the first to go. Imagine hearing someone arguing on the other side of this wall. You hear the voice but can't understand the words. The battery is in and she replaces the hearing aid.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (smiles) All better - Still interested?

dialogues.speaker: AVA FISHER
dialogues.text: ... Of course we're interested - I want you on the road, performing your songs - First we'll set up a showcase in Philadelphia then bring down the major label exec's from New York to hear the 'new' Philly sound, they'll love it, trust me.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: Sound great - Y'know, I'm pregnant.

dialogues.speaker: AVA FISHER
dialogues.text: (smiles) She's just full of surprises.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROCKY walks up to APOLLO CREED'S HEADSTONE which is quite elaborate.  17.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: ».- So, long time, friend - Hard to believe you're right here and I can't see ya - It's like everybody's goin' someplace - Yo, ya kid's doing good - Very good, not as good as you yet, maybe never. Ya don't know how good ya are until ya think ya starin' at angels, right?.. I'm suppose to go to ya house, but I don't wanna... I brought ya these. He pulls out a pair of ADONIS'S BOXING GLOVES.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Ya kid won the title in them. I'm gonna leave ‘em. I know somebody will steal 'em but I thought ya be proud. He hangs the gloves over the headstone.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: ++. Looks nice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The UBER pulls up and ROCKY exits. He looks anxious... Out front is the BLACK MUSTANG that ADONIS won back. The front door opens and MARY ANNE CREED steps out. Her expression is hard to read... The car leaves.

dialogues.speaker: MARY ANNE
dialogues.text: Hello, Rocky.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: (nervous) How ya doin' Mary Anne?

dialogues.speaker: MARY ANNE
dialogues.text: ++. I heard you were coming.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: (awkwardly) Yeah, Adonis, he said I should come over - Is it okay? A moment of silence.

dialogues.speaker: MARY ANNE
dialogues.text: Of course - Would you like to come in?  18.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: ++. Sure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARY ANNE has a drink and walks into the dramatically lit room. Cases of trophies and at least TEN DIFFERENT championship belts. Several large dramatically lit photos of assorted title FIGHTS.

dialogues.speaker: MARY ANNE
dialogues.text: ++. This is like a museum. I don't know why I keep all this around - Not exactly a feel good room. Do you keep old things, too? ROCKY is incredibly uncomfortable.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Few things - the restaurant.

dialogues.speaker: MARY ANNE
dialogues.text: People like seeing it, don't they? Talking about the good old days.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: (very uncomfortable) Sorta - We're not so busy... Y'know, I shoulda called ya more.

dialogues.speaker: MARY ANNE
dialogues.text: Nobody's blaming you.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Me - I'm blamin' me... Sorry I didn't stay in touch. (shrugs)

dialogues.speaker: MARY ANNE
dialogues.text: And say what? Apollo was his own man.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: (looks moved) If I could turn the clock back...

dialogues.speaker: MARY ANNE
dialogues.text: The clock stopped the day you let him take your place. I was there.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: I know -  19.

dialogues.speaker: MARY ANNE
dialogues.text: ++. You loved your wife?

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: ++. Course.

dialogues.speaker: MARY ANNE
dialogues.text: And you got to spend many years with her, the way it is suppose to be. What if that never happened, it would have been hard.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: oe. Very.

dialogues.speaker: MARY ANNE
dialogues.text: Apollo was not perfect and what happened, but he loved you, respected you and now here we are again. I know he came to you and all I ask is to never let something happen again, because he will push it an' push it, like his father. He can't help it - ROCKY stares at the floor.

dialogues.speaker: MARY ANNE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I'm over accusing, the blaming, does no good anymore, but what if it happens to him... Because it could. You had one man die in your hands, what will you say?

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: ++. I love your son. ROCKY stares deep into MARY ANNE'S eyes, pondering the moment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A CAB pulls up and ROCKY exits with his bags.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROCKY'S image is dwarfed by the high-beamed Spanish concourse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A black ESCALADE pulls up and ADONIS, ANTHONY and BIANCA out. ADONIS sees the Mustang, elated.  20.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: My 'Stang's back.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: I called Lil Duke an' said, your man got whipped good, so now show some class an' give back my little brother's ride back fast. Heading into the house, BIANCA eyes him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADONIS, BIANCA and ANTHONY enter. MARY ANNE greets them.

dialogues.speaker: MARY ANNE
dialogues.text: Welcome - Welcome! Before I say any more to you boys, I need to hug this young lady. Congratulations, how do you feel? She hugs BIANCA.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: Wonderful.

dialogues.speaker: MARY ANNE
dialogues.text: You look beautiful. (to Anthony) Glad you two worked things out - It's important.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Rocky's coming by soon.

dialogues.speaker: MARY ANNE
dialogues.text: He did, but he left.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Left? Was there a problem?

dialogues.speaker: MARY ANNE
dialogues.text: No, he just said he wanted to go home.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: (walking off) Man's got a restaurant to run.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: We were supposed to be celebrating. He helped make everythin' happen.  21.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: You helped him just as much. ADONIS reflects.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: He'll be fine... Baby, we got to be concentrating on our lives now.

dialogues.speaker: MARY ANNE
dialogues.text: ».. Dinner's about ready. ADONIS still troubled by the departure, nods and enters. ANTHONY reappears by the door.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: +. Check out what's on TV - Hurry up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADONIS steps closer to the LARGE SCREEN TV. BIANCA and MA ANNE are on the sofa. ANTHONY is standing behind ADONIS.

dialogues.speaker: SPORTSCASTER, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: Maybe one of the most hated men in boxing history! Living in near seclusion, the former Russian super fighter, who was formally defeated by American boxer Rocky Balboa in 1986, is back in the picture with his son, also a heavyweight who has been fighting under a different family name for many years... Why? Why come out of the "shadows" now?

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: Drago feels this "young" Creed has a life he does not deserve, did not earn.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: (to Anthony) This man's a thief - He's been trying to promote me. ANTHONY takes this in.

dialogues.speaker: SPORTSCASTER, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: Why would you want to open old wounds?

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: They never closed. Drago and Vitor remain silent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you haunted by the former champion's death?

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: - Not at all.

dialogues.speaker: SPORTSCASTER, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: You feel no responsibility?

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: ».. It was fight. He lost, what more is to say? DRAGO stares emotionless at the crowd and interviewer.

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: I was a great fighter and I had to leave my country like a dog - Politics - I live in other countries like a dog, ashamed of my name, my son had to live like this, too -

dialogues.speaker: SPORTSCASTER, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: So do you want revenge through your son?

dialogues.speaker: VITOR, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: We want what is owed.

dialogues.speaker: SPORTSCASTER, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: What exactly do you think you're owed?

dialogues.speaker: VITOR, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: Everything - What they have - What is fair.

dialogues.speaker: SPORTSCASTER, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: And what are your feelings about Balboa, since it was your fight?

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: I don't want to talk about him.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: Why are we watching this? MARY ANNE exits the room. ADONIS turns it off.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: That old man an' his punk are calling you out! You gotta answer back. 22.  23.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: Why?

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: Why?

dialogues.speaker: SPORTSCASTER, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: So what is it exactly you want?

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: They bring me to this country, dishonor me -

dialogues.speaker: SPORTSCASTER, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: Dishonor? Apollo is the one who died.

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: Not my fault - He was not strong enough.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: Turn it off - It's a stupid publicity stunt, money grab.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: So what? It's an amazing opportunity. D, you would tear the muscle-bound punk up - Bullshit kickboxer, what's that? You'd mess him up and make a statement, man, and the money. Creed Inc. He's a bum, no skills, brother.

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: Drago's son deserves some respect - Life is supposed to give second chances - This man has lived a real life, Adonis Creed took the easy route. He got a break he didn't deserve. If his father didn't break down barriers, if he wasn't a real warrior, Adonis Creed would not exist. Without "the name" who is he, really?

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: C'mon, D - Let's do this. ADONIS rises and exits.  24.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: (exiting) I'm asking you nicely to stop pushing this, understand me - Don't mess with our lives, mess with your own.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: -+. He should do it. ADONIS keeps going, incensed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The MOON is rising as the PASSENGER TRAIN rumbles down th track.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROCKY sits alone, staring out into the DARKNESS whipping past. There are only TEN PASSENGERS in the club car. A YOUNGER COUPLE is watching a movie on an iPad. An older sleeping HISPANIC WOMAN sits across the AISLE from ROCKY. ROCKY opens his OLD FASHIONED WALLET and pulls out a PLAS ACCORDION 10-PICTURE HOLDER and stares at the small PHOTO from his past: ADRIAN, MICKEY, ROBERT, HIS DOG, PAULIE, infant shots, etc.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADONIS sits in the DEN watching FOOTAGE of his FATHER'S FIGHT. He studies the grand images closely. The FOOTAGE i DRAGO beating APOLLO. He switches to his OWN PERSONAL FIG We see ADONIS beating a half dozen opponents... ANTHONY enters. He PACES in front of ADONIS. He holds up his IPAD.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: This shit is trending already - You didn't start this but you can finish it, you should. It's a chance to throw down, make a statement, everything's on your side and I want to contribute, be part of it. You got a chance to do something big. This fight would make "the statement", son of the greatest boxer ever - This word "ever" digs at ADONIS.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: - Against the man who beat the life out of him. (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Besides being the "right" thing to do, ya got a family on the way, this is "generational" money. Pops would say do it for your family, for that kind of cash, he'd come back from the dead - I know you'll beat this big punk easy, he's got no real skills - If I had what you had I'd be on it tomorrow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADONIS is alone in his MUSTANG. Driving nowhere in particular. He is lost in THOUGHT. HIP HOP MUSIC drifts f the radio... He turns if OFF and stares out into the nigh

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is cool, miserable, misty weather. We see VITOR DRAGO jogging in a crappy, mostly deserted, INDUSTRIAL SECTION of town. His hood is pulled tight as SWEAT and RAIN pour down his face. He looks menacing. Following close behind is IVAN DRAGO. His countenance is cold, pitiless. He flashes the LIGHTS indicating to pick up the pace. VITOR does not. IVAN BLASTS THE HORN! Still, VITOR remain defiant. IVAN brings the car closer, so close in fact, that he nea brushes up against the back of his son's legs. VITOR suddenly leaps to the side and POUNDS THE HOOD with hammer fist. IVAN SLAMS ON THE BRAKES and slowly gets out. He matches son's seething stare.

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO
dialogues.text: (in Russian) Run - You are me - I am you. The only sound is the monotonous rain as the smoldering tension subsides as VITOR peels off and continues running IVAN stares at the retreating figure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On this COLD, MISTY night, HOUSE MUSIC thumps out of the successful club as people arrive.  26. Out front is VITOR who is HEAD OF SECURITY... Dressed war he decides who gets in and who doesn't. Two high PUNKS in their early twenties try to get in. VIT menacingly gestures that they better get out of there. Intimidated, they move on. VITOR is a hard man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A WIDE SHOT of the historic building. ROCKY holding his SUITCASE is seen exiting the station.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROCKY is with the FEMALE DOCTOR who has treated him for t past two years. She scans a REPORT.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Any good news in there?

dialogues.speaker: DOCTOR
dialogues.text: Yes - The good news is the lymphoma is in remission.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Reversed?

dialogues.speaker: DOCTOR
dialogues.text: You could say that.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: So I'm gonna be around a while?

dialogues.speaker: DOCTOR
dialogues.text: (smiles) If the signs and symptoms stay reduced and remain that way for at least five years, you're pretty much disease- free. Of course, you must keep up with the prescriptions - But things are looking good. ROCKY gives a slight pensive smile.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Fantastic, really, my kid's coming to visit with my grandson for the holidays, been like forever - Now I got some good news to talk about for a change. (vises) Yo, Doc, thanks, you did great.  27.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADONIS exits the terminal with BIANCA and ANTHONY plus AIRPORT CURBSIDE PERSONNEL. Several VIDEO FILM CREWS and PAPARAZZI with their IPHONES recording are there as they straight to the waiting SUVS.

dialogues.speaker: REPORTER
dialogues.text: Adonis, Bianca - Is it good to be back home?

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: Always.

dialogues.speaker: REPORTER
dialogues.text: Are you fighting Drago's son?

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Don't believe everything you hear.

dialogues.speaker: REPORTER
dialogues.text: But he's calling you out, isn't he?

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: He's just a big bum with a big mouth.

dialogues.speaker: REPORTER
dialogues.text: So who's next?

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Bianca's singing tomorrow, don't miss it. That'll be better than any of my fights!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FISHTOWN. Rocky's hellhole neighborhood. Several CONSTRUC TRUCKS are outside. ROCKY enters. Several FIGHTERS, mostly young, are trainin The place has been brought almost back to the way it was the beginning. The co-owner from Creed - PETE - is presen

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Good job - I like it the old way.

dialogues.speaker: PETE
dialogues.text: But who's comin' to this neighborhood? Hey, is your guy doin' it on or not?

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Doin' what?  28.

dialogues.speaker: PETE
dialogues.text: Fightin' Drago's kid. Where you been?

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: On a train.

dialogues.speaker: PETE
dialogues.text: They're talking about Adonis fighting Drago's kid, not a bad idea, guy's muscle bound, easy day at office.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: ».. Nothin' easy.

dialogues.speaker: PETE
dialogues.text: When it happens, I want my kid on the card, okay? ROCKY exits.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An SUV with prepares to ROCKY's VAN

dialogues.speaker: AND BIANCA'S APARTMENT
dialogues.text: DRIVER is parked out front. ADONIS exits and enter. BIANCA is beautifully dressed. pulls into view. He exits.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: How ya doin' - Glad I caught ya - (to Bianca) Ya look beautiful.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: Thank you - Everything all right?

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Yeah, I gotta ask ya something about trainin' -

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Okay, she's singing tonight - What's the problem? BIANCA enters. ANTHONY holds back.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: heard about you and Drago's kid - That's not real, right? Somebody's goofin'.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: They think it's real.  29.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Is it real for you? You said what? No, right?

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: I didn't say anything.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: You'll walk through him - That's an event.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: You don't know what ya talkin' about -

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: No, it's just talk -

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Ya a real fighter - It's beneath you -

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Beneath me? Maybe, but you did it.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Different - Different reasons - Truth is, there's pieces I still haven't found - It's not worth it. If ya care about what I think, please, move on -

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Okay, got it - She's gonna be late.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Sorry - Good luck, Bianca - So, I can breathe easy? ADONIS smiles.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Yeah, you can breathe easy.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: You're making such a big deal out of this -

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: (ignores him) ».. Thanks. See ya at the gym. ADONIS exits.  30.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BIANCA performs the song we watched her compose during th Adonis montage. ADONIS watches her all lit up and glowing. She is beautif ANTHONY, arriving late, positions himself near the stage. Music executive AVA FISHER looks on with her BOSS and ASSISTANTS. As BIANCA reaches the bridge of the song, suddenly the bl drains from Bianca's face even though she's still singing smiling. FROM BIANCA'S POV her hearing FADES and COMES and GOES. S touches her EARPIECE.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: (while singing) +... Sorry, little off tonight. ADONIS watches her with mounting disappointment. The AUDI is MUTTERING. BIANCA finishes to courteous applause and she goes off st AVA scans the patrons. Her BOSS says something negative t her and leaves. ADONIS hugs BIANCA.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: What did I just do?

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: It was beautiful, baby. Believe it. ANTHONY approaches.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: I'll give it to you - That was strong.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: (to Ava) Sorry -

dialogues.speaker: AVA FISHER
dialogues.text: (double-talk) Well, it was good, but a little bumpy. You handled it beautifully.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: Thanks - Is everything still on?  31.

dialogues.speaker: AVA FISHER
dialogues.text: I don't think so.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: It was a malfunction - Won't happen again.

dialogues.speaker: AVA FISHER
dialogues.text: I'm sure. We'll be in touch.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: Thanks. AVA FISHER moves off.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: That's it. They're not calling.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Don't say that.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: Be real, okay - It's done. A DJ plays music. FANS and CELEBRITIES as well as all the rest of the WANNABES and DEMO HUSTLERS that come to showc looking for an angle, are moving to the beat.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Let's go, please. The MUSIC abruptly stops.

dialogues.speaker: TONE TRUMP, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Tone Trump in the house!! ADONIS and BIANCA look at each other and then look up and that

dialogues.speaker: TONE TRUMP
dialogues.text: The RAPPER that Adonis skirmished with, has taken the sta

dialogues.speaker: TONE TRUMP, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Lots of stars from Philly made it big.

dialogues.speaker: TONE TRUMP, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Kobe Bryant, I'll give props to Will Smith. I'll even give it up to my idol growing up, Apollo Creed. But Baby Creed? He can eat a dick. In fact, he can swallow my Johnson. That's his name. Johnson?  32. Cheers and boos from the crowd. Eyes are on ADONIS and BIANCA. ANTHONY checks out ADONIS'S REACTIONS. Cameras (a cell phone flashes) go off.

dialogues.speaker: TONE TRUMP, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I see you, Baby Creed. Wrote a song about you. Yo, anybody want to hear my song? CHEERS. A BEAT DROPS... and I hate to say it, but the beat is FIR And TONE starts rapping ABOUT ADONIS and DRAGO. Like Ice Cube's "No Vaseline" or Jay-Z's "Takeover" this be a diss track, but it's dope.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: Don't - D, let's go. Hell with this.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: (to Tone) You and your bitch crew, c'mon, bring it. But then TONE starts rapping about this:

dialogues.speaker: TONE TRUMP
dialogues.text: «+. Deaf bitch from around the way... ADONIS heads for the STAGE! FLASHES go off. ANTHONY and SECURITY pull him back.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: D, no! He's a pig!

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: Nah, man, not here. Let's go.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Let's handle this shit right now. TONE TRUMP, with GLEE, goes back to rapping about how YOU DRAGO would kick Adonis's ass.

dialogues.speaker: TONE TRUMP
dialogues.text: "Either one. Father or son. Done is done." Everyone's recording with their phones. SECURITY quickly ushers ADONIS and BIANCA out of the club  33.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Speeding down Broad Street. Nothing but silence and tight jaws in the car. ADONIS looks at his IPHONE X. The footage of the diss and freakout are everywhere. MediaTakeOut. Worldtar. Instagra

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: I gotta know who set this up, ‘cause this shit's not by accident!

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: The label probably set this up.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: What?!

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: Yeah, if thing's didn't go sideways, this would've been great hype. ADONIS stares at his hands for a moment.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: (calmly) I'm taking the Drago fight.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: Now you're being smart.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: It's not "smart".

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: Why's he in the game then? Easiest money you'll ever make, c'mon, Bianca.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: (to Anthony) I want to go somewhere alone with him, you mind?

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: Drop me off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An S.U.V. pulls up to the weathered apartment building an ADONIS and BIANCA exit. ADONIS looks at the building.  34.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Why're we here?

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: Do you remember that the first words you had with me in this building was a complaint?

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Yeah, you were noisy.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: And I remember when I looked down from that window that I almost fell out of because you were so damn handsome - I loved you at first sight and it's only gotten stronger. Nobody is going to love you more than me, except the child I'm carrying. Do you really want to bring the "past" into our life? Really? When you don't have to? We got so much ahead - Let's make our own history, not old history. Raise a family the way we wished we were raised - You don't need this, "we" don't need this - Move on, D, if I can give up something that I wanted my whole life, you can sacrifice a little, too. I believe you can do anything, but I don't want you to do this.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: What kind of man just walks away?

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: A man who loves something more than himself... ADONIS PACES then goes up to BIANCA, hugs her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A slight glow from the NEON SIGN indicates the joint is o

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The place is half full. ROCKY is at the front, greeting t few customers and reading a DOGEARED novel. Over the bar is an inexpensive paper BANNER that reads “WELCOME BACK HOME!" BIG SPIDER is behind the bar, blankly watching TV. ROCKY making small talk and glancing out of the window.  35. SPIDER sees the INTERVIEW, the same one with DRAGO and so

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER
dialogues.text: (to Rocky) Hey - He gestures to the TV. ROCKY comes over, sees DRAGO. His HEART drops. He TURNS it up.

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: I was a great fighter and I had to leave my country like a dog. Outside, a TAXI pulls up and ROBERT BALBOA, JR. steps out with his son, 8-year-old LOGAN. ROCKY sees the TAXI and t OFF the INTERVIEW and dashes outside.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Yo, finally! Ya's look great. He hugs ROBERT. Faces the child.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hey, there, Logan - Wow, did he grow.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: Yeah -

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: C'mon inside, it's a nasty cold night - So glad ya's made it! They enter.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (to Spider) Give 'em a hand with the bags, okay? SPIDER exits. ROCKY hugs his son again and turns to LOGAN. ROBERT looks the SIGN.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: You didn't need to do that.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: (laughs) - Course I did.  36.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: Well, thanks, it's getting late, he's tired, actually, I'm tired too, so we better get to a hotel. Just wanted to stop by and say hi first.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: No hotel, I'd love ya to stay with me - I'm right here, upstairs, there's plenty of room. Please come on, bought new sheets an' everything. (to Logan) Wanna see somethin' kinda rare?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROCKY carries one suitcase and ROBERT carries the other a they climb the narrow, dark old stairs.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: This is all ya's brought?

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: It's enough. Though they try hard NOT to show it, ROBERT and LOGAN are taken aback by the tight, hundred-year-old accommodations It's a TIME WARP.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: The joint's old, but don't leak much - Check this out. ROCKY goes to the BRAND NEW, modern, colorful AQUARIUM. I by far the NICEST OBJECT in the room. In THE TANK are his pet TURTLES.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Wake up! Ya got good company - This is "Cuff" and his friend speedin' around in there is "Link". I've had these bums for over 40 years. (to Robert) Right?

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: Yeah - My whole life.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: They're walkin' rocks, but nice - Yo, thanks for comin' - We'll have some fun.  37.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DRAGO, VITOR and BUDDY "KING" CHARLES exit the building.. They are guided them towards two waiting SUVs by a BODYGU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The camera pans down to find DRAGO and his SON near the b of the ROCKY STATUE: pure, cold hatred pours from Drago's eyes. Seated in the SECOND SUV is BUDDY "KING" CHARLES who is o the phone... DRAGO SPITS and LOCKS EYES with his son, then peels off t the SUV, followed by VITOR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADONIS lays in bed. The NIGHTLY NEWSCAST is on TV. BIANCA practices her music in the other room on the piano ADONIS ignores the TV as he stares at an IPAD in his hand is watching a VIDEO ON SIGN LANGUAGE FOR THE DEAF. He IMITATES some of the basic HAND GESTURES.

dialogues.speaker: SPORTSCASTER
dialogues.text: ++. That covers the NBA - At the moment now for boxing, newly crowned Light Heavyweight champ, Adonis Creed has agreed to a rematch with the unlucky "Stuntman" Wheeler. "Stuntman" Wheeler appears on camera. ADONIS glances up, back to the IPAD.

dialogues.speaker: WHEELER, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: It was just a freak accident - Wait ‘til next time. ADONIS puts away the IPAD and steps into the other room.

dialogues.speaker: SPORTSCASTER
dialogues.text: +... The top contender was stopped in the first round in what was a very unpopular performance. ADONIS studies BIANCA almost serenely writing lyrics whil tapping the piano's keys. Her HEARING AIDS are on the pia

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: What are you working on?  38. She does not hear him. His HEART breaks. He goes to her. Seeing him approach, she puts in the hearing aids and sof smiles.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: +.. These are a slight improvement.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: What've you been up to?

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: Writing lyrics.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Can I read them?

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: «+. Go ahead.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: - I like this line.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: +. Really? Are you just saying that?

dialogues.speaker: C.U. LINE
dialogues.text: "How much can you take when you can't take no more..."

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: I like it - Sounds like a fight song - Very nice. He kisses her and she carries on.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: ».. I may have to steal it. BIANCA starts to write.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (into her eyes) ++. I told you I'll let it go, but I want to be a good man and a good father and I can only do that if I feel good about myself - If something changes, I need you to be with me and believe in me... I need that. BIANCA touches his face and she continues to write.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BUDDY "KING" CHARLES sits behind his elaborate modern des  39. DRAGO and VITOR grimly watch a SPORTS BROADCAST of the announcement of the WHEELER/CREED rematch. DRAGO faces BUDDY, who just GESTURES with his all going to be all right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROCKY stands with LOGAN and ROBERT outside of that is being restored.

dialogues.speaker: LOGAN
dialogues.text: They're knockin' everything down.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Yeah, they been busy, but I'm keepin' this joint. (to Robert) Ya dad spent a lot of hours here, didn't ya?

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: Long time ago - Why restore this place? The neighborhood is gone.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: But I ain't -

dialogues.speaker: LOGAN
dialogues.text: That where you learned to fight?

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Yeah, did a little smackin' in there - Pain's a good coach. Points to the pet shop.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Met ya amazin' mother an' ya grandmother over there - It was fun.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: Should we go inside.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Okay -

dialogues.speaker: LOGAN
dialogues.text: Can you teach me to fight?

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Have to ask ya father about that.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: I don't think so. hand that it's the old gym  40.

dialogues.speaker: LOGAN
dialogues.text: I'd like to try,

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: There's no upside to getting hit in the head when you don't have to. ROCKY is slightly offended but brushes it off.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Nah, one punchin' bag per family is enough.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: I wasn't trying to insult you.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: -.. It's okay, I think it's funny. They all enter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADONIS is now working with PADMAN in the ring. TWENTY OTH BOXERS are present. Place is PACKED with FANS, HANGERS-ON PUNCH-DRUNK PUGS, you name it. ROCKY looks at the CLOCK.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Keep it goin' - Get all that pizza out of ya -

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: (punching) Love that pizza!!

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: 30 seconds. ROBERT and LOGAN are present. ROBERT feels out of place. is like a FLASHBACK of his life. As ROCKY watches ADONIS real concern, ROBERT feels a twinge of JEALOUSY.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: So how long have you been training him? Throughout, ROCKY NEVER TAKES HIS EYES OFF ADONIS.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Two and a half years - (to Adonis) Don't square up, wider stance!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (still working) Love that pizza!

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: (eyes on Adonis) Logan, ya wanna learn to do that?

dialogues.speaker: LOGAN
dialogues.text: Sure.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: How long you think you'll want to do this?

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: (watching only Adonis) As long as he wants me - Logan, ya father use to move good, too.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: - Not really.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: No, ya moved pretty good.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: Until I quit.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Ya had school stuff - (to Adonis) Time! BELL RINGS.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: Can I see you alone? Logan, come on. He heads outside.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: (senses something) Sure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FATHER and SON and LOGAN step into the biting cold. senses something is amiss.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: (to Logan) 'Nippy' out here. (nervous) (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: ++. There's a goofy word, 'nippy' - Who made that up?

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: +.. Yeah. Logan, could you please wait in the car.

dialogues.speaker: LOGAN
dialogues.text: Why?

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: It's cold. LOGAN gets into the rental car. FATHER and SON drift into an alley way.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You know I love you.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Love you, too.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: You know what's really special about you?

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Special? Not really.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: You're like a season that never changes.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: (at a loss) ».. Wow - Is that a good thing?

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: For what you 'did' and 'do' it's a plus - Outside the ring, I don't know. ROCKY shifts uneasily.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Ever see the way you look at him, at Adonis?

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: How?

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: Like he's part of you.  44. 43.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: No, just looks that way, maybe - You're my only son.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: I know, but face it, I couldn't live up to whatever makes you "you", maybe he can, but I don't want my kid going through that. Growing up was tough enough without him being in your "shadow", too.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: My shadow's gone - I'm old.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: It's never gone - Y'know, I tried to get your attention all the time, an' I even tried fighting, but I wasn't very good, so I stopped trying, and you know what you said?

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: ».. I forget sometimes.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: You said "Don't worry about it. You can't be better than you are".

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: It's just words.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: Yeah, but did I need to hear it? Not living up to what you are, that's a tough pill to swallow.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Just be "you", how hard is that?

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: Try telling that to other people. It's not so easy living with this name.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Could be harder livin' without it.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: You just live in a different world.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: (shrugs) «+. Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: It's harder to make it now.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Well, it was never easy, son - Y'know, I think maybe, when things have gotten a little too hard for you, you looked around for a soft spot to lay down.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: You're calling me a quitter now - It's all right, Adonis would never quit, would he?

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: He's someone else's son - You're my only - One hundred percent, everything I could do, I did for you and ya beautiful mother, I even didn't mind takin' a beatin' so so ya could have nice things - I thought I did pretty good.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: Yes, you did, but you expected so much —-

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: What? Maybe a "thanks" now and then

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: I could never live up to what you wanted.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: I never thought I was ya competition, just ya father.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: Fathers and son, it can't be helped - It's the way it is.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Don't have to be.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: It's the way it is, you don't get that.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: I don't wanna get it.
ROCKY studies his old, battered fist.  45.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I'm never seein' ya again, aml... It's okay, don't answer - I don't wanna know, ‘cause then maybe anythin' can happen, right?

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: «+. Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Y'know, it's sad, each of us thinks we're right an' the other is wrong an' the truth is flyin' around somewhere - If I could be somebody else an' make things good between us, I'd jump in but I'm just this - Y'know, I never lied to a friend, never hurt nobody who didn't deserve it - ROCKY steps a few PACES forward.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: An' I only gave you the best I could ever give until I had nothin' left. ROCKY pauses, points to the gym.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (gestures toward the gym) Gotta go... They need me in there - He starts to move off.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: ».. Please visit ya mother before ya go. ROBERT nods and moves away. He enters the car. ROCKY step into view. LOGAN puts his hand up in a BOXING POSE. ROCKY does likew The vehicle pulls away. The sound of a pounding SPEED BAG swells.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A LATINO MIDDLEWEIGHT FIGHTER pounds away on the SPEED BA The AURA in the gum is dark, joyless... Something is in t air. The other TWENTY FIGHTERS work on various pieces of equipment. A group of ON-LOOKERS sit along the three tier benches.  46. ADONIS works out with the punch mitts held by PADMAN. ROCKY labors up the stairs, thoroughly discouraged. As he pauses to collect his thoughts, ANTHONY arrives and energetically ascends the steps.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: (passing by) You okay, Stallion? He angles past. ANTHONY sees ADONIS in the ring. He passes.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Got two companies bidding for the ring mat. He enters the office. ROCKY wills himself out of the doldrums with each ascendi step. He arrives at the top of the steps, looking like hi old self. He heads toward ADONIS.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: (to fighters) C'mon, let's see some good sweatin'! Shake an' bake! ADONIS glances at him while he pounds away. ROCKY seems t pushing his enthusiasm a little too hard.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: C'mon, kid - There's nobody better than you! Hit those things - Go for it! That's it! ADONIS hits the PADS with increasing intensity.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TWO BLACK SUVS pull up, followed by LOCAL NEWS VANS and a T.M.Z.-TYPE ORGANIZATION. Out step DRAGO and VITOR. BUDDY "KING" CHARLES climbs out of the second SUV.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: P.O.V. of the NEWS CAMERAS as they follow the men up the staircase, filming in a documentary style.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROCKY holds a water bottle as ADONIS sips.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: I like everything ya doin'. Very good! But whip them shoulders more - ROCKY demonstrates the move.

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Adonis Creed! ADONIS pivots towards the voice. BUDDY makes his way forw The VIDEO CAMERAS' OPERATORS now swing in front of him.

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You did not respond to my many calls and invitations, so we thought we'd publicly drop by - DRAGO and VITOR clear the steps of the staircase. ROCKY lays eyes on DRAGO for the first time in over 30 YE It is very INTENSE.

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO
dialogues.text: What're you lookin' at?

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Why don't you move?

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO
dialogues.text: Make me. ANTHONY drifts out of the office. He appears anxious.

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY
dialogues.text: You fight for money, right, then keep fighting for it, because you certainly don't fight for honor!

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Better get out of here.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: I got this - (to Drago) Nobody wants you here. DRAGO smiles and moves forward.

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO
dialogues.text: I do. ANTHONY looks up at ADONIS.  48.

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY
dialogues.text: Adonis, nobody wants to see that Wheeler re-match. They want something better - Is this challenge too much for you, Adonis? ROCKY leans over to PADMAN and whispers. PADMAN pulls out phone. The other GYM FIGHTERS now CONGREGATE near the front of t ring, providing a type of buffer zone.

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO
dialogues.text: Why are you afraid of my son?

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: (to Adonis) Don't talk -

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Not afraid of anybody.

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY
dialogues.text: Good, because there's the chance to make things right - You know what I'm talking about, everyone does. So take it, what are you waiting for? You know what this man did to your father. You can live with that? (to Rocky) Can he?

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Why don't you shut your mouth an' get out.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Yeah, get out.

dialogues.speaker: VITOR
dialogues.text: Or what are you gonna do?

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: (to Buddy) Control your dog before I whip his ass.

dialogues.speaker: VITOR
dialogues.text: What'd you say?!

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: (to Buddy) You heard me.

dialogues.speaker: VITOR
dialogues.text: This dog'll kick your ass!

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY
dialogues.text: Not yet! (to Adonis) When are you going to face this man?! You just scared? Is he too big? Rocky fought big men, didn't you? You weren't afraid.

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO
dialogues.text: He is now.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Let's go - ADONIS starts to exit.

dialogues.speaker: VITOR
dialogues.text: The pussy turns his back - ANTHONY glances over at BUDDY, who nods.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: What's your problem man? (gestures toward Drago) How much shit you put in his head?

dialogues.speaker: VITOR
dialogues.text: Hey, I'm the real nigger here, who lived like shit when you were havin' ya ass kissed an' usin' a name that ain't even yours1l

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: You know nothin' -

dialogues.speaker: VITOR
dialogues.text: Your ol' man fucked up his life, now I'm gonna fuck up yours! That does it!! ADONIS CHARGES at VITOR but is held back b ROCKY, the CORNERMAN and several SPARRING PARTNERS! Several GYM RATS and BOXERS-IN-TRAINING attempt to stop VITOR'S forward charge. VITOR RIPS FREE and EASILY SHOVES smaller boxers aside. He WAVES AT ADONIS.

dialogues.speaker: VITOR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Ya shit, boy - You're shit - Nothing! DRAGO gets into the brawl, dropping two fighters with a H and RIGHT HAND. Everyone backs away from the lethal Russi  50. The CAMERA CREWS are getting their money's worth. The POLICE arrive. ADONIS struggles to free himself. POLI move forward. ADONIS looks at BUDDY "KING" CHARLES and steps out of the ring, heading to the locker room. ROCKY locks stares with DRAGO, who returns a dead eye expressions, then exits.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROCKY follows ADONIS into the room, followed by ANTHONY. ADONIS is strangely composed.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Didn't expect that.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: What you expect, them to go away? You said it was over.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: That's not happening, even if I wanted it to.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Thought you didn't want it to.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: It's here now, isn't it? Forget boxing. This is beyond. World wants this. ADONIS holds up his IPHONE.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: That kid was raised in hate, that's not how you were.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: You think you know all that?

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: You want revenge, then take it out on me, ‘cause I'm the reason ya father ain't here, not him!

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: You went after him and that was all good but I want to make it right and it's all wrong. Do you think you had more right to do it than me?  ROCKY and 51.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: No, but it don't look like you're doin' it out of respect for him - This ain't about defendin' ya father, ‘cause he had no idea who ya were, kid. He couldn't pick ya out of a line up - But years later, ya this son, defendin' a relationship that never was - Why?

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: You don't need to hear that shit -

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Then tell me something different!

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Everything I do is to make him proud. Every time I do something good, I look up in the sky and say "Proud yet? Good enough yet?" But it isn't.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Why do you put that on yourself?

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: I made this happen. (pause) I wanted it to happen. ANTHONY are stunned.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: You made what happen?

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: I paid that promoter. I wanted this to happen... I'm not my father, I'm using what I have while I have it. I want to get their real respect, people not be the victims anymore. Not get beat up anymore ‘cause of their skin, killed anymore, no power to change things because they look different, think different. That shit can't fly anymore - A champion's gotta be more than just another black man hitting things, so I'm taking

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: that anger back in the ring an' remindin' people that they let a man get beat defenseless 'til he died and nobody cared and nothin' happened. (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Time moved on but now they're going to see what it's like when things are reversed.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: I ain't saying I know what ya goin through -

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: No, you don't. You know I respect you more than anybody and you know I'm not doin' this 'cause of ego, I want to leave something behind that means something - My father didn't, but I do.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: You still got to keep ya mind right - Anything can happen.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: Don't put that in his head.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: The way you feel about that, he feels about you -

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: That bum won't know what hit him.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: So it's impossible to lose?

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: You think I'm going down and not get up? This isn't yesterday - You don't have to worry about throwin' a towel.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: You should have Lil Duke train you. I think he'll cover you best an' ya know him.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: What about you? What's the problem?

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: I been through this -

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: He's afraid.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Maybe, wish I was stronger about this, but I'm not.  53.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: So you're out?

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: For this. Outside the ring, fight for whatever ya want, but inside, the only thing ya should be fightin' for is ya life - Good luck. ROCKY exits.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROCKY pulls the CHAIR out of the TREE and places it in fr of ADRIAN'S HEADSTONE. He simply stares off into the sink grey light of the day... Slowly rising up in VOLUME is the GRAND THEME of the next scene.

dialogues.speaker: H.B.O. SPECIAL
dialogues.text: The dramatic special appears to show a high traveling DRAMATIC shot of LAS VEGAS at night. DRAMATIC MUSIC.

dialogues.speaker: NARRATOR
dialogues.text: (dramatic) In the desert is a crown jewel of many lights that serve as a beacon for travelers all over the world to explore, be entertained and try their luck. But several miles beyond the glamorous oasis, across barren desert, lies some of the most grand and foreboding land in the world. It's called simply "Death Valley". We see a shot of ADONIS running through the parched earth sunrise.

dialogues.speaker: NARRATOR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Like the man who is Adonis Creed, the landscape is hard, resilient and always challenging.

dialogues.speaker: NARRATOR
dialogues.text: As one of the best light heavyweights in the world, Adonis, in a career that has seen him struggle to emerge from the shadows of the legendary Apollo Creed, is putting his next title defense on hold. He has chosen to avenge his father's tragic death at the hands of the infamous Ivan Drago. Scene shifts to an OLD GYM where VITOR works out with IVA DRAGO in the background. He looks pumped and brutal.

dialogues.speaker: NARRATOR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: An ocean apart and like out of a Shakespearean drama, it is not the patriarch but the son, Vitor Drago, a bull of a man who will defend the Drago name -

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: Outdoor scenes of VITOR running.

dialogues.speaker: NARRATOR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: The young Drago feels like the family has unjustly suffered because of an untimely tragedy and Adonis Creed has not earned what he has and should not be champion.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: ADONIS shadow boxing up a jagged, steep hillside with cha rocks spread before him.

dialogues.speaker: NARRATOR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Adonis calls this personal and wants to put the insults and disrespect to rest no matter what the cost, and with his superior skills end this nightmare.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: VITOR training in the gym.

dialogues.speaker: NARRATOR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: His opponent thinks his nightmare is just beginning... VITOR faces the camera.

dialogues.speaker: VITOR
dialogues.text: I'm a bad man and will beat ‘em worse than his father got.  55. More cuts of VITOR outside in a tank top running with a P BULL who bites a stick and VITOR hurls him into the air.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: ADONIS as he runs across the desert, we cut to clips of h fights.

dialogues.speaker: NARRATOR
dialogues.text: Adonis Creed, proving to be a fearless fighter who has tested his metal - ADONIS is seen knocking out SEVERAL MEN in dramatic slo-m style. We see VITOR in much cruder surroundings, knocking MEN ou

dialogues.speaker: NARRATOR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: - Will pit his skill and pride against a hostile unknown with nothing but personal retribution on his mind. We see ADONIS running in dramatic fashion towards the hig point.

dialogues.speaker: NARRATOR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Life is a Circle and History and Time often do not hide the scars and erase the ferocity of the past.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: VITOR standing between two classic Greek columns looking a modern Hercules.

dialogues.speaker: NARRATOR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Alongside the glory, the unknown danger is ever present, the paths they take will never run parallel for each man but their personal histories are forever star-crossed. ADONIS arrives at the top of the cliff and stares out at hostile territory.

dialogues.speaker: NARRATOR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Like the hellish landscape that has often proven invincible, Adonis Creed plans to conquer this personal challenge and move on with his blessed life.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: "... I will destroy him, I promise."  56.

dialogues.speaker: NARRATOR
dialogues.text: The Boxer and the Beast, a brutal reconvening, a deeply personal journey, pulling two men from different parts of this planet to end of a decades long family rivalry and their future and family's legacy will be determined by their skill and in the power of their fists.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The CROWD is brimming with expectation. Several groups ar wearing "REMEMBER APOLLO" t-shirts and several hold up si that read "VENGEANCE IS MINE - ROMANS 12:19". This is a very animated crowd, extremely vocal in their h for Drago AND the SOVIETS as well.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Welcome one and all to this evening's unusual event. The huge, relatively unknown European with the familiar last name, Vitor Drago, is set to go against Light Heavyweight Champion Adonis Creed in what could be called a special event, but this has a real undercurrent of a ‘vendetta’ or ‘payback'. Earlier in the day, we caught up with the belittled yet unapologetic man himself, Ivan Drago. CUT to FOOTAGE of DRAGO.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Why now?

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO
dialogues.text: (Russian accent) Why not? This is something that has been building long time - This country was bad to me, having me fight an' old man instead of the champion. Then, in Russia, I was embarrassed, cheated. But all will be over soon and we'll have the respect we deserve.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BIANCA, who is VERY PREGNANT, sits watching Adonis SHADOW BOXING in the mirror. Anthony is present. ADONIS moves around, slowly JABBING.  57. From the group: YELLING OF ENCOURAGEMENT.

dialogues.speaker: LIL DUKE
dialogues.text: Stay inside his reach, okay? Can't stay on the outside - Side to side, then inside, got me? ADONIS smiles at BIANCA and uses a "Hand Sign".

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: (hand signs) ».. I got this.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: (hand signs) I love you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VITOR methodically throws incredibly powerful RIGHT HAND PUNCHES into punch mitts held by DRAGO himself. VITOR throws again.

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO
dialogues.text: Remember what they did to me. VITOR throws with UNBELIEVABLE FORCE. It CRACKS against t pad, sounding like a shotgun blast. DRAGO picks up VITOR'S HUGE BOXING ROBE. From the angle, cannot read what is on the back. VITOR'S EYES show disapproval.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The COMMENTATORS stand up facing the camera.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: This is the first time in several years Balboa will not be in his corner. Why do you think that is?

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Maybe he just isn't on board with this "fight" because of what happened years ago when things went tragically wrong... The CAMERA pans the crowd.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Tonight, the "past" catches up to the "present" and sets the future...  58. ROCKY takes his seat directly behind Adonis's corner. The LIGHTS DIM. A BLUE HAZE BACKDROP provides a dramatic display as the DRAGOS enter the arena. The building reson with BOOS. HEAVY METAL MUSIC blares from the speakers. Stepping into view is VITOR.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Vitor has fought all his life under a different name, tonight is the first time he will be announced by his real name -

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Said they were embarrassed by what happened years ago.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: That may change tonight - Vitor Drago is a very powerful looking man but will his ability keep up with Adonis Creed's ringmanship?

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Good question, but he looks hard core. Many of the CROWD taunt DRAGO with FOUL LANGUAGE. One bol ANTI-FAN attempts to grab hold of VITOR'S SHOULDER. DRAGO GRABS the anti-fan BY THE CHEST and SHOVES him back roughly into the crowd. Tough as VITOR is, he is disturbed by the growing level o hatred as he moves towards the ring... He did not expect INTENSITY.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: One unruly fan just got manhandled by Drago. VITOR reaches the ring and enters. IVAN stands besides hi son, soaking up the energy of being in the limelight agai The MUSIC is very intimidating, vicious. The crowd BOOS. DRAGO calmly MOCKS the crowd with an upra fist. Turning around, we see embroidered on the back of Vitor's robe: "APOLLO R.I.P."

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: (re: robe) That's in really bad taste. Actually, appalling.  59.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: If he wanted to mess with Creed's head, that'll do it. The MUSIC changes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crowd cheers as ADONIS appears on the SCREEN. His mus BLARES.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Adonis Creed now making his entrance. Definitely a crowd favorite. ADONIS, game face on, CLIMBS into the ring. The crowd LOV

dialogues.speaker: HIM
dialogues.text: VITOR immediately steps to the center of the ring and giv the THROAT SLITTING gesture. As VITOR turns, ADONIS sees the back of the ROBE: APOLLO R.I.P. ADONIS LOSES IT! Tries to RUSH FORWARD as VITOR stands li an intimidating statue. Lil Duke BLOCKS HIS PATH.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: (pointing to Vitor) +.. Gonna beat your sick ass!

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
