dialogues.text: Adonis Creed is enraged and attempts to get to Vitor Drago, who mocks him! ADONIS'S anger is glowing but LIL DUKE, along with CORNER and official RING SECURITY manage to separate them. DRAGO is enjoying the mayhem.

dialogues.speaker: VITOR
dialogues.text: You're goin' be under my foot!

dialogues.speaker: RING ANNOUNCER
dialogues.text: In the blue corner, with a mixed martial arts record of 45 and 2 and  60.

dialogues.speaker: RING ANNOUNCER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: 26 professional boxing fights, this being his debut in America, weighing 235 pounds, Vitor "The Hammer" Drago! A few RUSSIANS in the audience applaud but are drowned ou the pro-American crowd. It only inflames DRAGO. BIANCA, very much on edge, takes her seat. She eyes Buddy "King" Charles... She's not happy. ANTHONY sits next to h

dialogues.speaker: RING ANNOUNCER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: In the red corner, weighing 199 pounds, the newly crowned Light Heavyweight Champion of the World, Adonis "Speed" Creed! The crowd EXPLODES!

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Certainly has the support of this crowd behind him!

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: They want Vitor Drago demolished but that's a big task if Vitor has a "jaw" to match his size. The REFEREE motions of the COMBATANTS to come to the cent of the ring. The BELL RINGS and DROWNS OUT the last curse word. ADONIS goes straight forward and LOCKS EYES with the huge man. IVAN DRAGO exchanges DAGGER EXPRESSIONS with ROCKY, he has detected sitting behind Creed's corner. As the REFEREE gives instructions, the two fighters overl one another with VULGAR INSULTS.

dialogues.speaker: REFEREE
dialogues.text: I want a clean fight. Protect yourself at all times and when I say ‘break', break. Good luck -

dialogues.speaker: VITOR
dialogues.text: Where ya gonna run, boy? VITOR holds out his gloves.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: I'm gonna close that mouth.

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO
dialogues.text: ++. You've lost.  61. The men return to their CORNERS.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: ++. You can actually feel the hatred for each other here. IVAN DRAGO steps outside the ropes. He turns, facing his

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO
dialogues.text: (in Russian) You were born for this. LIL DUKE looks deep into Adonis's eyes.

dialogues.speaker: LIL DUKE
dialogues.text: Control that shit! Stay inside his reach. ADONIS simply wants to get it on!

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Ring the bell! BIANCA sits nearly frozen in apprehension.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: (to Adonis) You got this! You got it! The BELL RINGS and Adonis CHARGES the Big Man with bad intentions.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Adonis wastes no time attacking the much larger Vitor Drago! No ‘feeling out' round, folks!

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: What a surprise - The smaller man has Drago backing up!

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Creed's making a statement early on! VITOR pushes the smaller fighter away and then is FURIOUS ATTACKED again by Adonis. Adonis circles and fires off ra jabs.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Forget the head! The body!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARY ANNE watches Adonis rip into the big Russian.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DRAGO does not like what he sees and BERATES his son.

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO
dialogues.text: (in Russian) Attack! VITOR goes into attack mode.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: ROCKY: from his point of view, this looks almost exactly the beating that was given to APOLLO.

dialogues.speaker: DAY... THE COMPARISON IS EERIE.
dialogues.text: Adonis comes in straight ahead and gets caught with a THUNDEROUS BLOW which delights Drago.

dialogues.speaker: VITOR
dialogues.text: Hit me. That's it? VITOR turns to the CROWD and gives ADONIS a THUMBS DOWN gesture. ADONIS starts to rapidly CIRCLE and JAB. They are barely reaching the target, but Vitor is starting to WALK THROUG the punches.

dialogues.speaker: VITOR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: C'mon, gimme somethin' - Gimme somethin'. ROCKY sits. He is feeling every emotion a fighter would f who was in the ring.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Back off!

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Adonis is still going after his opponent but falling short.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Vitor's big right hand is locked and loaded!! Sure enough, ADONIS throws a LEFT HOOK and VITOR counters with a thudding RIGHT, which badly ROCKS ADONIS. ADONIS rapidly backs up against the ROPES. ADONIS tries t lay him up and VITOR SMASHES ADONIS in the JAW with a flagrant illegal elbow! CROWD boos. The REFEREE admonishe him. VITOR mocks ADONIS.  63.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: (from seat) Circle, circle! Off the ropes! (to himself) He's done. The crowd SCREAMS for ADONIS to rally. VITOR cuts Adonis off: Adonis is again PINNED AGAINST THE ROPES.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Drago is like having a brick wall standing in front of you! VITOR delivers a pair of LEFT - RIGHT COMBOS that land wi concussive force! Adonis FIGHTS ON and CATCHES Vitor with a BODY-PUNCH to h LIVER.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: Yes!! That's what I'm talking about!

dialogues.speaker: LIL DUKE
dialogues.text: That's it! More of the same! Bust him up! But VITOR is too powerful and smiles at him - Telling him hit him again, harder. BIANCA leaps to her feet.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: (yells) You got to stop this!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VITOR, hands at his side, sticks out his JAW. ADONIS hits NO EFFECT. Then, like a BOLT OF LIGHTNING from hell, Vitor EXPLODES a brutal OVERHAND RIGHT that clubs ADONIS behind the ear sends him CRASHING TO THE CANVAS!! The AUDIENCE IS STUNNED. FEAR fills Rocky's eyes. HE ALMOST WANTS ADONIS TO STAY D

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Take the count!!  64. VITOR says something unintelligible to the fallen fighter then RAISING HIS FIST, he strolls to a neutral corner. ADONIS goes to ONE KNEE. We see a moment of DOUBT creep i his eyes. EVERYTHING IS OUT OF FOCUS. VITOR disdainfully wipes the BLOOD way from his NOSE and glances at this father.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: This is the advantage of a full- blown super heavy weight - incredible hitting power. One punch and it's good night!

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Creed just can't get inside!

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: And he is being dismantled by the brutal strength and rough house tactics of Vitor Drago!

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Creed better find plan B fast. What's he doing? He's waving Drago forward!

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: That's crazy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mary Anne SCREAMS at the TV:

dialogues.speaker: MARY ANNE
dialogues.text: Stop the damn fight!

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: Oh, my God - Just stay down. ANTHONY looks VERY SHAKEN UP by the unexpected beating hi brother is receiving.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: The ref is about to stop this one- sided affair.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Creed better throw something back or it's over!

dialogues.speaker: LIL DUKE
dialogues.text: Let the damn hands go!! Vitor unloads a BRUTAL BODY SHOT that causes Creed's knee almost buckle. BELL!! He shoves ADONIS hard and returns t the corner, fist raised. Buddy "King" Charles rises with his BODYGUARD.

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY
dialogues.text: (to bodyguard) ++. It's over. ANTHONY is dismayed as he watches BUDDY exit.

dialogues.speaker: IN THE RING
dialogues.text: LIL DUKE climbs into the ring along with his CORNERMEN. ROCKY rushes to the step behind Creed's corner.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: (to Adonis) You can't do this!

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: You did!

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: (to Adonis) Listen to me, not him!

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO
dialogues.text: (yelling in Russian) He's finished - Back him up and beat him down, make it last.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANTHONY looks very badly affected by this horrible beatin

dialogues.speaker: CREED'S CORNER
dialogues.text: ADONIS and LIL DUKE. Duke yells into the fighter's profil Adonis sneaks glances at Vitor then Bianca.

dialogues.speaker: LIL DUKE
dialogues.text: Man, you gotta step it up! Move, goddamnit, don't come at him! BIANCA is pacing in the aisle. She looks at ROCKY.  66.

dialogues.speaker: LIL DUKE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Don't need you takin' his 'best', ya gotta just stop doing' the shit ya don't got to be doin' - ADONIS rises.

dialogues.speaker: LIL DUKE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (yelling) You got a bad man in front of you so let it go and get that chump outta here!! THE BELL RINGS. ADONIS catches a glimpse of ROCKY as he moves to the cent of the ring. VITOR moves to the CENTER of the ring. Surprisingly ADONI attacks first!

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Can't say this man doesn't have heart, but here comes Drago! VITOR hits back with a combination that nearly RIPS Adoni head from his shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: (to Lil Duke) He's done! Call it! ROCKY's point of view: We go to SLOW MOTION as -- It is almost a DUPLICATE of the DEADLY PUNCH that killed Apollo. Still in SLOW MOTION, we see BIANCA rise to her feet as Adonis DRIFTS HELPLESSLY towards the ropes. LIL DUKE desperately reaches for the TOWEL. IVAN DRAGO rises to his feet, his face flushed, SCREAMING victory. Sensing the end is near, the AUDIENCE seems to RISE as on Vitor's face contorts into a mask of HATE and FURY as he coils back his body and unleashes a brutal left hook. The CROWD goes CRAZY! ROCKY rushes forward and rips the TOWEL from LIL DUKE'S h and THROWS IT!  67. As the TOWEL is in mid-air, VITOR now unleashes all his p into a SEISMIC OVERHAND PUNCH that pile drives Adonis unconscious to the canvas.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Creed is OUT!! My God, what a shot and he's not getting up! One of the most vicious shots ever! A sensational right hand knockout for the powerful Vitor Drago! CREED'S CORNERMEN LEAP into the ring followed by professi CAMERA CREWS and MEDICAL EXPERTS. IT IS COMPLETE MAYHEM. The arena goes BERSERK. BIANCA struggles to get into the ring but is blocked. She cries hysterically. ROCKY shoves past the gathering crowd of security people other personnel. ROCKY kneels besides Adonis as the RING PHYSICIAN and MED EMERGENCY STAFF examine him.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: A BRUTAL knockout. The kind you hate to see! ADONIS'S eyes slowly open.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Now he's moving! He's still out of it but at least he's looking around VITOR PUMPS HIS FIST at the crowd.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Don't move, kid - You'll be alright. IVAN DRAGO pats his son's shoulder but he is more interes in GLARING at ROCKY. The image of Adonis is displayed on the JUMBOTRON SCREEN. ROCKY is beside Adonis, who now has been lifted into a se position against the ropes. BIANCA is outside the ring, crying as she tries to inch closer.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Let ‘em check you out!!  68. It is CHAOTIC! The JUMBOTRON plays back the KNOCKOUT again for the crowd SLO-MOTION.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: IVAN DRAGO muscles his way through the CROWDED RING and hovers over ROCKY and ADONIS.

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO
dialogues.text: (cold) «+. He still alive? ROCKY turns and unleashes a BIG RIGHT HOOK that instantly BLOODIES Drago's mouth. Rocky POUNDS AWAY: another RIGHT/LEFT/RIGHT combination t DRIVES Ivan Drago back! SHOCKED ONLOOKERS back away from the sudden violence.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: A fight has broken out! The two men are throwing wild punches! The AUDIENCE ROARS. VITOR pauses from TAUNTING. He RUSHES towards them as - The massive Ivan Drago POUNDS Rocky with BRUTAL PUNCHES. ROCKY is SMASHED AGAINST the ROPES but rallies and refuse go down - He pounds furiously away on DRAGO'S BODY. SECURITY rush in and separate the MEN. VITOR arrives as his father TOWERS MENACINGLY over ROCKY. ROCKY, terribly exhausted, slumps to the ground.

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO
dialogues.text: You never beat me!!

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: (winded) Who cares! The scene FREEZES IN A PHOTO STILL of ROCKY and ADONIS HEADLINE: "PARTNERS IN PAIN".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADONIS is on the table. ROCKY, ANTHONY and BIANCA look at each other.  69.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: -..I'm fine.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: Please. It's a precaution - Do it, Donnie. As ADONIS RETRACTS into the machine, BIANCA is feeling th beginning of cramps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADONIS closes his swollen eyes as the WHIRLING SOUND of t CAT SCAN MACHINE builds in volume.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BIANCA is in a wheelchair, being led away by a NURSE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Late at night, very little activity.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The silence is overwhelming as ADONIS lays sedated in bed His mind still racing over what has transpired. The door his room OPENS. A LARGE FIGURE walks across the room and takes a seat in shadows. Only his outline is seen because of the glow of MOONLIGHT emanating from the rear window.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Who are you?

dialogues.speaker: STRANGER
dialogues.text: You know me, course you do. The STRANGER leans forward and we see it is APOLLO CREED!

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: You're dead.

dialogues.speaker: APOLLO
dialogues.text: Went out the hard way.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: You had everything.

dialogues.speaker: APOLLO
dialogues.text: It's never enough.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: But you left everyone behind.  70.

dialogues.speaker: APOLLO
dialogues.text: You come in alone, go out alone.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Did you know about me?

dialogues.speaker: APOLLO
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Would it have mattered?

dialogues.speaker: APOLLO
dialogues.text: It's good being worth something to others, but it's better to be worth more to yourself.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: So you only cared about you? They both look at each other. Holding the moment.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Did you even love my mom? Or Mary Anne?

dialogues.speaker: APOLLO
dialogues.text: Relationships come and go. Honor, that lasts... Glory, that lasts...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADONIS opens his badly bruised eyes. Moments later, ROCKY walks in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADONIS follows a NURSE down the hall in the MATERNITY WAR ADONIS'S face is still quite SWOLLEN but he is feeling no pain at the moment. ROCKY follows behind. The NURSE stops him at the door of a DELIVERY ROOM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BIANCA lays in the bed with a lovely INFANT by her side. The door opens and ADONIS enters. ADONIS is almost moved to tears. He studies the INFANT'S features as he looks speechless and grateful to BIANCA. BIANCA, though exhausted, is glowing.  71.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: --. She's beautiful.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: Yes... Baby, sit down.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: I missed it...

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: She's here now.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Yeah - She's beautiful. ADONIS looks at ROCKY.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: «+. Incredible.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Congrats - You're lucky, man. ROCKY exits. He passes ANTHONY in hallway.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: Heard it's a girl.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: ».. Stay with him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROCKY sees LIL DUKE in the waiting room.

dialogues.speaker: LIL DUKE
dialogues.text: (guilt-ridden) He okay? They said he's just banged up - I tried to show him what's right, but he wanted it his way. I tried -

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: You did -

dialogues.speaker: LIL DUKE
dialogues.text: I got train' to do tomorrow.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: ».. I got this. LIL DUKE exits.  72.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADONIS sits besides BIANCA.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: ++. I can hold her?

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: ++. Of course.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Bianca, how is everything?

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: ».. Fine. We're all good. Just worry about yourself.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Did they test her yet?

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: Tests were inconclusive.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: +... When can we try again?

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: (nods) ... When we're home - That okay?

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: ++. Sure. ADONIS thoughtfully nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VITOR and his CORNERMEN are passing through the lobby. He pauses to sign for a couple of FOREIGN TOURISTS... Takes pictures. They see the FOOTAGE on the JUMBOTRON from the fight. VIT is pounding out ADONIS. The CRAWL reads: "VITOR DRAGO TES POSITIVE FOR PERFORMANCE ENHANCING DRUGS".

dialogues.speaker: JIM LAMPLEY, (ON JUMBOTRON)
dialogues.text: European fighter Vitor Drago ran afoul of the "Clean Boxing Initiative" and was found to be using a pair of antibiotic substances, as a result, Drago has been put in harm's way and placed on suspension by boxing's governing bodies. Increasingly in boxing, you can run from a positive test but you can't hide. Meanwhile...  73. The blood drains from the fighter's face. People stare at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VITOR walks forcefully down the hallway and stops where h proceeds to POUND on the hotel room door. After a moment, Buddy "King" Charles's BODYGUARD opens the door. VITOR pushes past the BODYGUARD. He goes in the room and sees BUDDY with DRAGO, who PACES.

dialogues.speaker: VITOR
dialogues.text: This is bullshit!!

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO
dialogues.text: He doesn't understand, this is good.

dialogues.speaker: VITOR
dialogues.text: That I cheat?

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY
dialogues.text: Don't let a bunch of half-assed American sports headlines bother you.

dialogues.speaker: VITOR
dialogues.text: You let him do this?

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY
dialogues.text: Don't worry about it. (beat) You're for real and we're creating "controversy". You killed his manhood -

dialogues.speaker: VITOR
dialogues.text: I won this clean!

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY
dialogues.text: Nothing's clean.

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: From the beginning, your old man only wanted to take this show to Russia, now, if he wants it, he's got to come to us. Vitor, don't over think it - You had nothing three months ago. VITOR glares at his father and exits.  74.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADONIS, BIANCA and ROCKY are sitting in silence. She hold the baby. ANTHONY almost BURSTS into the room.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: (elated) You watching the TV? It's on fire - He wasn't clean! You didn't lose - He cheated!! ADONIS remains silent.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: Hold it down, please.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: It's good news - Gotta feel good about this - Everybody knows it's all bullshit - You're the better man.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: I hear you.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: I got to be feelin' good about this - No bullshit back talk about getting you ass beat - You could have won it on the up and up! Y'know what I'm saying!

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: He knows.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: What's happening here? Man, I thought you'd be jumpin' all up and down, wanting him all over again! You all right, man?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROCKY stands with ANTHONY.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: He's beat up, a beatin' like that don't go away.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: I get it -  75.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: You don't get nothin' - He's hurtin', his world's upside down.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: He'll fix all that. He's got it all, he'll get it back. That punk was juiced.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: I don't care what he was, fighters are never the same after a beatin' like that. It's a life changer.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: What's that mean? He's done?

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: He needs to think about things.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: Are you saying it's over? Everything - business, reputation - He always comes back.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Until ya don't. You all about the money?

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: Don't insult me, man. He's my brother.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Then be there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The BIG CITY labors along.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROCKY is INSTRUCTING a group of neighborhood BOYS and GIR in the art of SELF DEFENSE.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: BIANCA doing a workshop with CHILDREN who have hearing problems but are musically inclined.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADONIS walking with his bundled YOUNG INFANT past the cit ZOO.  76.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANTHONY settling in at a desk in a completely inactive office.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In RUSSIA, with his son, IVAN DRAGO is being asked to tak photos with many high-ranking MILITARY and POLITICAL FIGU VITOR is bored with it but complies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADONIS sits alone, bored. He attempts to play with the CH but his MIND is elsewhere. In the other room, BIANCA WRITES and noodles riffs on the piano.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BUDDY "KING" CHARLES is holding a contract that he displa to ANTHONY. We can tell from the BODY LANGUAGE that BUDDY is frustrat that Adonis won't take the REMATCH... ANTHONY exits.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Inside, ROCKY is watching three of the young neighborhood TAGGERS applying something on the wall... The other poor neighborhood KIDS watch, fascinated, as th IMAGE slowly takes form.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In a DARKENED GYM, VITOR sits alone. He is TENSE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SPRAY PAINTING on the wall is finally completed. The YOUNG ARTISTS step away. What is revealed is an AMAZING, KINETIC painting of JESUS CHRIST in boxing trunks and gloves, knocking a super-musc SATAN out of the ring and into a sea of HELLISH FIRE. Above the painting is boldly written "FAITH IS STRENGTH!!  77.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alone, the powerful young man sets up a VIDEO CAMERA.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADONIS approaches BIANCA. He stares at her.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: When are we going to test her?

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: When are we going to test her?

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: (writing lyrics) Soon -

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: ++. I need to know what's goin' on - I need to make some choices.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: Choices?

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Why are you dragging this out? Do you think I'll leave?

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: Some men would.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: I'm not "some men".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He watches the TELEVISION. VITOR is on ESPN.

dialogues.speaker: REPORTER, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: Adonis Creed, having repeatedly turned down the offer for a rematch with Vitor Drago, who was judged to be using performance enhancing drugs, has elicited this very angry response.

dialogues.speaker: VITOR, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: I am callin' a coward!! I am Vitor Drago, not my father! Vitor, the new one! (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: VITOR, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: And I don't give a shit what anybody thinks I did about the drug bullshit - Think what you want! Does not matter to me! We fight a hundred times, you lose a hundred times!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADONIS watches the TV. BIANCA is asleep.

dialogues.speaker: VITOR, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: (hard, pacing) I don't give a shit about any money! I want to fight this Creed, any place, any time. No drugs, no nothin'!! I am real!! Very real! Here's my email! He holds up a SMALL CARDBOARD SIGN that has his EMAIL ADD written out.

dialogues.speaker: VITOR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Write it down! Everybody listen up. If he does not have the balls because he was beat down so bad, smashed so bad, I'm makin' the offer to anyone who's good! Anyone who's tough enough! Any person, any nationality, any breed. I am the best man there is, no anger here! I'm gonna be a legend - Put this on TV. Real men fight. I don't care who he is or what he is, but real men fight until they're dead. Creed, you can take your shirt off, we fight inside, outside, in the rain, okay? Look at me, everyone! My name, once again, is Vitor Drago. I move around a lot but you, Creed, can reach me.

dialogues.speaker: VITOR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I am easy to find and I will smash you again. You were beaten! You were under my feet, you quit, I beat ya fair an' square, but I beat you, I beat you... Like a drum, I beat you... God, I'd hate to be you... VITOR turns the CAMERA OFF.  79.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is a FAINT KNOCK on the apartment door. ADONIS answers. ANTHONY stands in the dimly lit hall.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: ».. What ya doin'?

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: +.. I gotta say something. What the hell you doin', man?

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Don't worry about it.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: You scared?

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Don't ever say that.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: You look scared. That's what "scared" looks like.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Go home. ADONIS starts to leave and ANTHONY angles in front of him

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: Didn't say it's all bad - Who wouldn't be scared? Who wouldn't wanna say "fuck it, who needs this?" Who wouldn't be embarrassed, like no man should! Bad shit happened but you weren't all there.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Or maybe I'm not what I think I am.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: There is that! You could say that - But it's not true -
ANTHONY paces a few steps back.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Now me, that's who I am. I'm not who I think I am - And that's not so easy to live with - I'm getting used to it - But you - You got mad gifts, you got skills. You got everything from Pops. (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I got the leftovers, but hey, it is what it is - It's okay, once ya accept you're not so special, but goddamn, you - You got responsibilities to people like me to show what a special man "can" do when everything says ya "can't"! You got a damn important responsibility to show what is possible when smart money say impossible!! People like me quit, that's not so unusual, ‘cause I don't have the same gifts like you but not people like you, ‘cause if the warriors quit... We don't walk away ‘cause shit get ugly, we don't walk away ‘cause life kicks our ass on a daily basis, but we keep tryin' even if it's hard and frustrating and unrewarding and nobody's even gonna be cheerin' our name, we still have that pride that gets our ass out of bed in the morning to try all over again. You got "gifts" like I said, "skills" and not to use them makes me mad - Mad.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: I'm not afraid.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: No - What?

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: ... Ashamed.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: So what? You let people down.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: So what?

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: So what?

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Who asked you to be "all that" to everybody - Put you first and ya family first and whatever's left over, pass it around. People need to see what's "possible".

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: An' if I get knocked out again?  81.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: Then I guess it was "impossible" an' forget we ever had this fucked up conversation. ADONIS finally breaks into a smile and they embrace.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: ».. I hate you, man.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: +. Hate you, too - Now do it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A LOCK is heard opening and ADONIS, holding the BABY CARR enters and climbs the dark steps. Reaching the top, he flips on a light that illuminates pa of the gym. He heads to the SPEED BAGS. The BABY CARRIER is placed on a stool. He kisses the INFA then goes to the speed bag. He starts to hit slowly at first. The sound reverberates throughout the empty, dark gym. No reaction from the INFANT. ADONIS increases the SPEED. reaction. Fear and SWEAT form on ADONIS'S BROW as he POUN HARDER and FASTER. No reaction. ADONIS'S eyes flash back and forth in near desperation between the speed bag and his child. No reaction. His raw hands increase the tempo of the speed bag until i thunderous sound rattles the gym walls! No reaction.
In final desperation, he reaches a mighty CRESCENDO and W the left hook into the bag which SMASHES it against the wooden surface. This creates a sudden, unexpected explosion that resemble

dialogues.speaker: SHOT BLAST
dialogues.text: He looks to the INFANT who is startled and begins to cry. ADONIS slumps against the wall and begins to cry himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The door opens and BIANCA quickly rushes to the door.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: Where have you been?!

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: ++. She can hear better than me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROCKY stands with ADONIS.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: He wasn't clean.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: That's what they say.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: You don't believe it?

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Older I get, less I buy - Your wife?

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: She understands who we are - Like your wife did. ROCKY thinks about it.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: How'd you do it?

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Do what?

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: You lost a lot -

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: 24 times, I think.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: What kept you goin'?

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Winnin' feels good. 82.  83.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Will ya help me? ROCKY takes several paces.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Ya looked pretty good before the fight - Feel good?

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Yeah, ya looked everythin' except "vicious". ADONIS locks eyes with ROCKY, knowing it's the truth.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: He was vicious and ya lost. It's not complicated.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: ».- So let's get vicious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stunning southwest vistas. A dusty S.U.V. looks quite lonely as it kicks up a swirli tail of dust while heading off the main road and winds do towards a group of WELL-WORN BUILDINGS appearing at the l point of the valley, surrounded by DARK CLIFFS. INT. S.U.V. ADONIS looks at the dismal, primitive surroundings.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: .».. Not many people here. The S.U.V. pulls to a dusty stop. Parked in front of the ADOBE STRUCTURE are five fried, older PICK UP TRUCKS, a d 650cc MOTORCYCLE and a FLATBED TRUCK with several BALES O HAY on it. The unmistakable CADENCE of punching bags being hit DRIFT outdoors. A sign reads in peeling letters "PURGATORIO EL BOX".

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: You went to the mountains. I'm going to Hell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The music begins to drone in as the sun's power slowly radiates down on an endless expanse of barren land. ADONIS comes into view as he jogs through rugged landscap Sweat pours from his body as he trudges along.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Is seen running along a city river early morning... Fat follows in car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADONIS is seen pounding away on the WELL-WORN heavy bag i the dusty gym. ROCKY coaches. ANTHONY observes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VITOR pounds away on the heavy bag with tremendous force DRAGO coaches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADONIS on the speed bag - ROCKY coaches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VITOR does single arm presses with one end of the barbel anchored to the floor. There is also a green rubber exerc band connected to the weight for extra resistance. DRAGO intensely coaches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADONIS has a pair of ropes around his shoulders as he str to drag a very large truck tire up an incline. His knees buckle from fatigue... ROCKY pours water on his head. ADO shakes it off and RISES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VITOR whips a pair of 15 foot thick weighted ropes in a w like fashion to build his shoulder strength and cardio.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADONIS does pull-ups on the two-by-four chin-up bar in th sun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VITOR, clad in a soaking sweatsuit, leaps up while smashi medicine ball on the ground - This is done repetitively. DRAGO looks on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADONIS sleeps then rises - 5 A.M.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADONIS runs up the jagged trail holding a pole with 10 ga water cans hanging from a pole across his shoulders... It incredibly exhausting... ROCKY yells encouragement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROCKY opens a large jar of SALVE and ADONIS scoops some o and puts it on his blistered feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VITOR runs up steps - DRAGO looks on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADONIS practices DUCKING LOW under a ROPE while throwing upper cuts to either side as he moves forward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VITOR has a 4 FOOT WEIGHTED POLYURETHANE LOG-TYPE piece o equipment that he flips side-to-side in a very graceful manner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Outdoors, ROCKY SWINGS a RAKE HANDLE at medium speed over ADONIS'S head as the fighter slips under it over and over One swing hits him PAINFULLY in the shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: IN SLO-MO
dialogues.text: VITOR now has the polyurethane exercise log swinging gracefully from between his legs, then leaping into the a he spins in the OPPOSITE direction, SWINGING the "log" ov his head and DOWN through his legs. INCREDIBLY ATHLETIC.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADONIS has a rope tied around his waist as he tires to sl move up an incline... ROCKY pulls back on the rope, addin resistance. ADONIS slowly throws hooks with a BRICK in ea hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VITOR punching the mitts - DRAGO looks on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hitting the heavy bag even harder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Amazing road through the center of the desert, heading in the hills. ADONIS runs gracefully along it. His mind is racing with dark thoughts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A truck pulls up with two very large HEAVY WEIGHTS. ROCKY greets them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VITOR is running through a small obstacle course. He is v graceful for a big man. His speed is stunning.

dialogues.speaker: SPEED BAG
dialogues.text: ADONIS ATTACKS the object with renewed vigor!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VITOR has on HEADGEAR and begins SMASHING SPARRING PARTNE Three punch COMBOS and CUT!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADONIS wearing headgear is RIPPING into LARGER SPARRING PARTNERS. He is standing TOO UPRIGHT and gets ROCKED BADL ROCKY stops him and corrects his angle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VITOR rips combos into sparring partners.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADONIS throws the ALMOST SAME COMBINATIONS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VITOR is doing WEIGHTED SIT-UPS.  87.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADONIS is outside, positioned against the gym wall... He holds a CAR TIRE at arm's length and using centrifugal fo and speed, WHIPS IT from side-to-side, having the tire sm into the wall with great force -

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: ADONIS bobs and weaves beneath the extended rope.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: VITOR sparring.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: ADONIS slipping underneath the LARGE SPARRING PARTNER'S j and rips to the jaw but he still gets tagged because of h upright angle. The sparring partner looks away, dismissiv ROCKY instructs. ADONIS points at the rude sparring partn

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: I'll get you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VITOR is doing strenuous push-ups and lateral chest flies a set of extended GYMNASTIC RINGS.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: INTERCUT 3 TIMES between VITOR doing this exercise and AD hanging from a BAR doing CURLS and ROCKY hitting his mid- section.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: No pain - (hit) No pain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VITOR is now punching a multi-functional punch machine wi 10 different angles to hit from. He is going at a MEDIUM PACE... His FATHER yells to up th effort.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADONIS tears into the SPARRING PARTNERS... BELL RINGS! RO gives him a thumbs-up sign.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DRAGO yells for his SON to hit harder and move faster. Th fighter is exhausted, but keeps trying.  88.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADONIS hits the speed bag with FANTASTIC CONFIDENCE. His blaze with fire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VITOR is at his limit as he punches away at the machine. Every TENDON and MUSCLE is ready to burst, STILL his fath taunts until VITOR EXPLODES and heaves the MACHINE on its side!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADONIS is seen heaving heavy rocks from one pile to anoth He is in the "No Pain" Zone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone watches as ADONIS now fights like a new man, a puncher, a wreaking machine. He rips into the LARGE SPARR PARTNER who had been disrespectful and takes him down in grand style.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Bring it on! The room agrees!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Establishing shots of the city. Snow falls. In the distan we see powerful spotlights reach up into the sky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: People are entering the building.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The CROWD is settling into their seats as a crew of rings RUSSIAN BROADCASTERS speak into their headsets. Another professional fight is winding down in the ring ab them. The THREE AMERICAN BROADCASTERS are in front of the ring facing the cameras.  89.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Welcome one and all to this evening's event in Moscow on this cold evening. Earlier this evening, both fighters arrived at the arena to prepare for the rematch.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: ADONIS, followed by ROCKY, LIL DUKE, CUTMAN, and ANTHONY. ADONIS wears EAR BUDS and wears a game face. Beside him i BIANCA.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: A very heavy underdog, Adonis Creed has sworn that this evening will definitely not be a repeat of the blowout and frightening ending of their last encounter.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: VITOR DRAGO strides confidently into the building, flanke his FATHER and CORNER ENTOURAGE... Vitor's eyes are omino hidden beneath his hoodie.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Ivan Drago has made it clear this will be a worse beat down than before...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The COMMENTATORS are lined up before the cameras... They stand with promoter BUDDY "KING" CHARLES.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: With us now is promoter Buddy "King" Charles - Why the passion for this rematch, considering the results in Vegas being so one sided?

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY
dialogues.text: History. The last time an American fought here, the results were not good. A big victory tonight for Drago would help erase that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROCKY is wrapping Adonis's hands. BIANCA and the corner c look on as do RUSSIAN BOXING OFFICIALS. ADONIS appears consumed with inner turmoil. Nervous sweat rims his forehead. ROCKY senses the growing anxiety.  90.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Breathe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The place is very active with well-dressed POLITICAL OFFICIALS taking photos with VITOR. Many players of the u class and their WOMEN. VITOR DRAGO is not enjoying this activity. IVAN is. TWO CAMERA CREWS, including a third SHOWTIME CREW, take i the pre-celebratory atmosphere. VITOR is a caged animal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SHOWTIME CREW analyze.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Since Creed and Balboa requested no cameras be in the dressing room, we can only assume he is very focused and wants to stay that way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADONIS'S hands are being checked by the RUSSIAN OFFICIAL. Once done, he gets up and paces towards a mirror. He stud his reflection.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: What's the plan?

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: To be first.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: He throws?

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: I throw first.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: He hooks?

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: I hook first.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: He hit you hard?

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: I hit him harder!  91.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Sounds like a plan. ADONIS smiles at BIANCA.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A young RUSSIAN BAND plays. The mood is festive yet charg as people settle into their seats. RUSSIAN FLAGS hang all around the top of the ring.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: They are in party mode here in Moscow! They want something special this evening. Homecoming for the once invincible Ivan Drago.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Since Creed was so easily dispatched in the first go-round he's now considered a 25-1 underdog. Maybe a classic case of "Careful what you wish for".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The FIGHT OFFICIAL leans in and states that they are abou enter the ring soon. IVAN DRAGO nods but continues to min with the FASHIONABLE CROWD, SMILING for the first time. Enjoying the attention. VITOR stands alone, shadow boxing, trying to get emotiona focused.

dialogues.speaker: VITOR
dialogues.text: (to assistant) Get them out.

dialogues.speaker: ASSISTANT
dialogues.text: (gestures towards Drago) He wants them... VITOR roughly turns off the MUSIC coming from an IPHONE a SPEAKER.

dialogues.speaker: VITOR
dialogues.text: (in Russian) Gol (to camera crew) Watch the fight - Go watch it! Enough of this shit!

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO
dialogues.text: (in Russian) What are you doing?  92. VITOR ignores him.

dialogues.speaker: VITOR
dialogues.text: (to crowd) Gol

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO
dialogues.text: I said, what are you doing?!

dialogues.speaker: VITOR
dialogues.text: This is my time, not yours! VITOR glares at DRAGO with a ferocity never seen before.

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO
dialogues.text: Don't look at me that way! We are all we have, Vitor, it is all - I am not a good man, I know that. I treat you bad, I do not know why, but I do and your will and your strength has brought me back here - All I wanted. Tonight, win for you. You have already won for me. VITOR is stunned by this REVELATION.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: We heard that Adonis has put on more weight and hopefully muscle since

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: their last fight. Adonis Creed should be entering this arena any second now. The SPOTLIGHTS are aimed at the tunnel. The CROWD begins STOMPING their feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADONIS, ANTHONY, PADMAN and ROCKY approach the entrance i the ARENA. They pass an ARENA GUARD who speaks into a wal talkie. Adonis's MUSIC STARTS... BIANCA, microphone in ha steps forward, SINGING LIVE THE SONG SHE HAD STARTED TO COMPOSE EARLIER... It is dynamic! ADONIS gestures to lead way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The CROWD faces the entrance.  93.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Music's up, Adonis Creed's entering the arena, I believe that is Bianca, singing the entrance song, that's new and good.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: She's great. ADONIS enters and his BIANCA'S MUSIC KICKS INTO HIGH GEAR ADONIS glances at the HOSTILE CROWD and then at ROCKY. ADONIS arrives at the ring and kisses BIANCA. He stares h at the THREE STEPS leading into the ring. DAUNTING. Takin DEEP BREATH, he climbs them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARY ANNE CREED sits with the NANNY and the INFANT as she observes Adonis's entrance on TV.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The LIGHTS and MUSIC suddenly CHANGE. The SPOTLIGHTS wing to the entrance: time for VITOR DRAGO COMPANY. VITOR enters to the THUNDEROUS APPLAUSE and his hard-core HEAVY METAL music by the group "Slip Knot". Wearing his SKULL FACE BANDANA around his lower face, he presents an INTIMIDATING image. IVAN DRAGO walks directly behind his hulking son, but his demeanor is vastly different. He appears lost in thought, transported back in time to w he was the invincible fighter of his country. In his mind, Drago hears the original RUSSIAN NATIONAL AN playing and glances up at the massive BANNER that depicts youthful image super-imposed over the former Russian flag Ivan SNAPS BACK TO REALITY when they arrive at the ring. climbs through the rope. BUDDY "KING" CHARLES sits near the ring.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Big Vitor Drago enters, followed by the stone-faced Ivan Drago. Vitor Drago, a hard punching son who actually enjoys slowly breaking his opponent down.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: ».. Looks bigger than last time. VITOR walks over to ADONIS'S CORNER and glares at him. In condescending motion, he dares Adonis to move forward. IV DRAGO stands close by and GLARES at ROCKY.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: The psych-out begins. ADONIS stares at VITOR and gestures at the skull scarf covering the big Russian's nose and jaw.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Ain't Halloween, fool.

dialogues.speaker: VITOR
dialogues.text: (gestures around) Yeah it is. VITOR backs up and IVAN DRAGO gives ROCKY a withering sta before moving toward his corner.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: The men are exchanging words and gestures. The corners try to keep the antagonism under control until the bell, even the ref is telling them to back off. VITOR uses the "Cutting the Throat" gesture. The crowd lo it.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: They won't let up. Drago and Rocky are having their own stare down!! This could be a double feature - The RING ANNOUNCER steps to the center of the ring and th BELL RINGS.

dialogues.speaker: RING ANNOUNCER
dialogues.text: (in Russian) Welcome to tonight's main event! We are honored to have back home one of the greatest athletes ever produced from this country. Former two time Olympic Heavyweight Champion - A man who still holds the record with six Gold Medals in world competition - Ivan Drago! The place erupts in CHEERS!  95.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Guess they failed to mention the only man to defeat him happens to be about 20 feet away -

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: - Minor detail.

dialogues.speaker: RING ANNOUNCER
dialogues.text: Without delay, in the blue corner, from the United States - A smattering of BOOS from the audience.

dialogues.speaker: RING ANNOUNCER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: - Weighing 200 pounds, the reigning light heavyweight champion, Adonis Creed! VERY LITTLE APPLAUSE. VITOR continues to GESTURE and VERBALLY MOCK Adonis.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: He'll talk less when ya break the ribs. ROCKY manages a faint smile at ADONIS then locks eyes wit DRAGO.

dialogues.speaker: RING ANNOUNCER
dialogues.text: In the red corner, standing six foot, five inches, weighing an even 253 pounds, with seventeen consecutive knockouts, Russian's own Vitor "Red Devil" Drago! The crowd GOES CRAZY!

dialogues.speaker: VITOR
dialogues.text: You tell ‘em that? VITOR raises his fist but is annoyed.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: He's a hard case, no doubt. Maybe Adonis can soften him up this time.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Vitor Drago is immense but Creed looks as hard as steel - Damn good.  96.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: I heard he put in weeks in the desert. We'll see if something worked. The CORNER MEN clear the ring. ADONIS and VITOR go to the CENTER of the RING.

dialogues.speaker: REFEREE
dialogues.text: (British) You both know the rules. In case of a knockdown, you will go to a neutral corner. Break when I say break. May the best man win.

dialogues.speaker: VITOR
dialogues.text: Your eyes say you're scared.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Actually, they say "Fuck you". They return to their respective corners. ROCKY faces ADONIS as Adonis glances down at BIANCA sitti in the second row.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Ya gonna get hit hard. Prepare for it. Expect it! Keep the head movin', down low. Smash the body!

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Love ya, Unc. Adonis WAVES at BIANCA, who is TEARING UP already. DRAGO leans over to his son, who stands like a statue, glaring at ADONIS.

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO
dialogues.text: This night changes everything! VITOR ignores him and stares straight across at ADONIS.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: There's the bell! Out charges Creed! ADONIS moves directly into HARM'S WAY and BOB-WEAVES unde Vitor's jab and scores three major BODY BLOWS that make V WINCE.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Here's a new look from Adonis Creed.  97. VITOR begins to come forward and NAILS Creed twice. Creed backs away and starts circling while jabbing, much like h old style.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: What're you doin'? The body!

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: That new style didn't last long. Now Creed is fighting in his usual style. VITOR is enraged and circles after him, his big right han COCKED BACK.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Stay close! Get low!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROBERT and several of his FRIENDS are having a VIEWING PA They are transfixed on the bank of TELEVISIONS that line establishment.

dialogues.speaker: VIEWER
dialogues.text: What do you think? Two rounds?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adonis REMAINS UPRIGHT and hits the man with two more jab while backpedaling. He unbelievably THROWS A THREE PUNCH COMBO that lands. The crowd goes NUTS.

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO
dialogues.text: (screaming) Attack!

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: It's amazing. Creed is almost landing at will.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: But the punches are having no effect as the lack of leverage works against Creed. ADONIS continues to rapidly CIRCLE and hit the RUSSIAN wi three more jabs while quickly backing away.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: A blistering pace by Creed and Drago looks like he wants to kill him.  98. Adonis CIRCLES. He throws another LEFT-RIGHT-HOOK combination, followed by a SCORCHING HOOK! It's amazing: the CROWD is staring to BOO!

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO
dialogues.text: Catch this bastard! VITOR charges with his RIGHT HAND cocked back. Adonis sid steps and throws two more jabs. Changes direction and UNLEASHES a pair of brilliant right hands that drives the AUDIENCE'S BOOING to a VOLCANIC PITCH! VITOR literally charges at ADONIS with murder in his eyes ADONIS changes direction and catches him AGAIN!!

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: This is deja uv. This is exactly the way his father fought against Vitor's father. ADONIS throws a couple more JABS but they are brushed asi like pesky flies. VITOR'S grimace has been replaced with a SINISTER GRIN. H WAVES Adonis forward!! Meanwhile, Vitor's huge left arm is hanging at his side a moves FORWARD. ADONIS throws another jab that lands and Vitor SMIRKS and GESTURES to try it again!

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: He's setting you up! Get off the ropes. VITOR lets ADONIS hit him with a RIGHT HAND, then unleash TOWERING OVERHAND RIGHT that SMASHES into Creed's face an sends him REELING BACK into the rope! The crowd EXPLODES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARY ANNE is panicking.

dialogues.speaker: MARY ANNE
dialogues.text: Oh God, no -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three gruesome BODY SHOTS painfully drive ADONIS along th ropes.  99.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Tie him up! Vitor POUNDS CREED with body shots. ROCKY glances at the TOWEL. Just when it looks hopeless, Adonis RALLIES.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: Tie him up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VITOR charges back and throws a right that connects a sec AFTER THE BELL RINGS. ADONIS reacts to the CHEAP SHOT by countering with a LEFT HOOK. The REFEREE separates them. VITOR SHOVES HIM and CURSES.

dialogues.speaker: VITOR
dialogues.text: (to Adonis) You can't hit for shit - DRAGO comes over. ROCKY guides ADONIS away.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: The fighters hit after the bell and this arena is on the verge of pandemonium. Drago and Rocky exchanged words! And Adonis Creed is off to a rough start.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: He's lucky to survive that onslaught.

dialogues.speaker: IN DRAGO'S CORNER
dialogues.text: DRAGO is outraged. He shakes his fist in his son's face.

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO
dialogues.text: What are you doing?! Put him down!

dialogues.speaker: IN ROCKY'S CORNER
dialogues.text: ROCKY'S TEAM works on ADONIS. He is hurt but not swollen  100.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: Amazing, brother, amazing!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROBERT watching his father tending to Adonis as the corne work on him. The crowd is supporting ADONIS.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Forget the toe to toe "pride" crap! He's stronger!! Always will be, got it? But don't tell me he's tougher! Use ya brains and not ya guts, be mean, but be smart! YA GOTTA STAY

dialogues.speaker: VITOR
dialogues.text: Don't come out! VITOR rises. Drago GLARES across the ring at ROCKY with P HATRED.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Expect the pain an' give it back! The BELL RINGS. VITOR rushes out of his corner and starts to FIRE OUT JAB that Adonis drops low and slips. The style is TOTALLY DIFFERENT. He is BOBBING AND WEAVING

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Creed wisely seems to have switched to Plan B. Hoping to close the distance! VITOR is pounding away. ADONIS manages to SLIP half of th

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Side to side! VITOR is actually playing to the crowd. He MOTIONS for th to CHEER him on harder.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: vitor Drago is toying with Creed!

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Ya getting closer, roll!!  101.

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO
dialogues.text: (screaming) Hit the bastard!! VITOR loops a straight RIGHT HAND and Adonis SLIPS IT and FIRES a leaping LEFT HOOK that catches the beast flush on nose. BLOOD seeps from Vitor's nose!

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Oh, a beautifully timed leaping hook from Creed bloodies the big man's nose! Maybe it's broken!

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Here comes Creed!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARY ANNE nearly leaps with excitement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Creed DOUBLE HOOKS him into his corner and unloads six bo shots in rapid combination. The CROWD is on its feet. VITOR TIES HIM UP but Adonis breaks free!

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Go for it! Like an ENRAGED BULL, VITOR shoves ADONIS. VITOR rushes forward, and throwing a THREE PUNCH COMBO, D

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: A clean combo drops Adonis in his tracks, but miraculously, he is up at the count of three!! ADONIS is up immediately. VITOR stands several feet away, TAUNTING Adonis. The REFEREE tries to push him away to a neutral corner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Angry, ADONIS looks at ROCKY who indicates he's okay.  102.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: One thing for sure, Creed has a hell of a jaw to take that last shot! I don't know how but his eyes look clear and he's up at seven.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Stay close and crack that body!

dialogues.speaker: IN DRAGO'S CORNER
dialogues.text: VITOR raises his fist in victory.

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO
dialogues.text: Finish it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROBERT looks at the adoration in the crowd.

dialogues.speaker: VIEWER
dialogues.text: ».. He's as tough as ya old man! ROBERT tenses.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: «+. No way.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Because of Drago's failure to go directly to a neutral corner, Creed has a few precious seconds to clear his head! The REFEREE motions for both men to continue fighting. VITOR DRAGO, oozing confidence, holds his RIGHT FIST in t air.

dialogues.speaker: VITOR
dialogues.text: Where you want it? Where do ya want it?! VITOR jabs and drives Adonis back into the CORNER.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Circle - Clear ya head!!  103. ADONIS unloads a COMBINATION that STUNS Vitor and digs to ribs.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Keep poundin'! The PUNCHES are coming with AMAZING SPEED! VITOR tries to get off the ropes but ADONIS puts his head Vitor's chest and hits him with A MASSIVE HOOK that KNOCK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The VIEWERS cheer. ROBERT looks from screen to the excite expressions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vitor HEAVES Adonis back into a CORNER and pounds Adonis' head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BIANCA: The crowd noise is overwhelming. The pain is evid

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: Cover up. Oh, God. She takes out her HEARING AIDS and the ROAR of the stadiu noise drops 90::percent::... It is an eerie contrast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adonis DOUBLE HOOKS Vitor, who answers back with a left h The BELL RINGS and ADONIS hits him after the bell.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Hurts, don't it?!

dialogues.speaker: VITOR
dialogues.text: (outraged) I'll kill you!

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: (backs off) Ain't killin' nobody. The MEN are separated and the CROWD is on their feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SPIDER and several customers watch ROCKY work the corner.

dialogues.speaker: CUSTOMERS
dialogues.text: ».. You got this!

dialogues.speaker: IN DRAGO'S CORNER
dialogues.text: Vitor arrives at his corner.

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO
dialogues.text: Are you weak?! What the hell are you doing! Knock him out!

dialogues.speaker: VITOR
dialogues.text: You're weak, you LOST!

dialogues.speaker: IN _ROCKY'S CORNER
dialogues.text: ROCKY steps in front as ADONIS sits. ANTHONY hands him th water. They lock eyes for a second.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: How ya feelin'?

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Hurting - Your style sucks.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: I know, but it's working - The BELL RINGS.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: We got what is shaping up to be a very competitive fight! It's gonna be a rough one!

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Go for it! You're the best!

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: Get it, brother! The FIGHT now goes into a MONTAGE (approximately 3:30) of men exchanging punishing blows and the tides shifting in men's favor. The CROWD is swept up in the DRAMA. People cannot believe ADONIS is still on his feet and INFLICTING DAMAGE on the Russian behemoth.  105. The BATTLE becomes an engrossing display of GUTS, DIGNITY SHEER WILL to win on Adonis's behalf. Adonis will PUNISH and BE PUNISHED by a powerful foe. Eve when knocked down, he rises and charges into the heat of battle. The use of SPEED CHANGE, COLOR PALETTE, OPTICAL EFFECTS a insights into the men's SUBCONSCIOUS, as well as the fighters' P.O.V. while enduring extraordinary pain yet re pushing forward in pursuit of victory, will all be on display. 11th ROUND: The ninth round ends as expected in a FURIOUS exchange: V PULVERIZING Adonis with two shots to the liver. Adonis's KNEES BUCKLE but somehow he stays upright and battles back! As the BELL RINGS, the two men have to be separated. DRAG roughly shoves ROCKY aside as he leads his battered son b to his corner. ROCKY ignores DRAGO and helps ADONIS to the corner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The TV cuts to ROCKY attending to Adonis in the corner.

dialogues.speaker: LOGAN
dialogues.text: That's my grandfather!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BUDDY "KING" CHARLES is not enjoying what should have bee easy VICTORY.

dialogues.speaker: IN ADONIS'S CORNER
dialogues.text: ROCKY, CUTMAN and ANTHONY attend to ADONIS.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Hard to breathe.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: I know, kid, I know -

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: You got this -

dialogues.speaker: IN _DRAGO'S CORNER
dialogues.text: Drago GLARES into his son's bruised face.  106.

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO
dialogues.text: He is beaten! Finish him!! VITOR remains silent, amazed ADONIS is still present.

dialogues.speaker: IN _ADONIS'S CORNER
dialogues.text: ADONIS swallows deep breaths.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Everything is saying "No more". But don't listen, don't hear nothin' except ya brain sayin' "I can do it! I can do it!" - Say it - "I can do it!"

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: I can do it! The BELL RINGS. The FIGHTERS RISE.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Vicious. The TWO FIGHTERS come to center ring. The REFEREE indicat to touch gloves. Vitor refuses.

dialogues.speaker: VITOR
dialogues.text: (spits) Toe to toe.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: I'm here. The TWO FIGHTERS square off. VITOR now resembles a GHASTL reminder of his father in his prime. ADONIS is no longer fighting FLATFOOTED and in a classic boxer's crouch. He now RESEMBLES his old self: UPRIGHT, LIGHTER ON HIS FE This has VITOR confused. Vitor's BLOODY SNEER stretches across his face as he wave the ENERGIZED Adonis forward. VITOR charges and Adonis side-steps and avoids the rush again. He still has NOT THROWN A PUNCH. The crowd is getting agitated.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Creed was having success with his crouching style of fighting and for some reason, he has abandoned it.  107.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Now he's back to his normal style - Maybe not a good idea.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Drago continues to charge like a wounded bear. They are exchanging words!

dialogues.speaker: VITOR
dialogues.text: Fight! C'mon! Bring it!!

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: You're too slow. VITOR tries to cut him off and ADONIS slips out of the corner. He LUNGES again.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: What are they doing! Now it's a war of words! ADONIS circles to his left, pointing.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Ya got nothin'!

dialogues.speaker: VITOR
dialogues.text: c'mon! INCENSED, IVAN DRAGO pounds the ring apron.

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO
dialogues.text: (in Russian) Get him!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARY ANNE is fixated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VITOR throws and ADONIS slips and COUNTERS which catches VITOR on the TEMPLE and staggers him... ADONIS now drives him back. The CROWD is GASPING.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Go for it!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROBERT looks at the CROWD that are on their feet.

dialogues.speaker: CROWD
dialogues.text: «e. C'mon, do it!! ROBERT now rises.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VITOR is on the ropes. Adonis PUMMELS him with HOOKS and RIGHTS to the head and body that has the Big Man staggeri and WINCING in pain with each body shot.

dialogues.speaker: DRAGO
dialogues.text: Fight back!! VITOR manages to SHOVE Adonis off. He hits him with an UP CUT that rocks him!

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Now!!

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: Do it! Do it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SPIDER and PATRONS cheer the men on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADONIS attacks with UNBELIEVABLE FURY. He hits with rapid fire PUNCHES to the body and head!! Both men are very EXHAUSTED but still dangerous. They now settle in and throw all CAUTION ASIDE. They go TOE TO TOE

dialogues.speaker: VITOR
dialogues.text: (bellowing) Come on!! ADONIS and VITOR exchange heavy blows, neither man willin concede. ADONIS then uncorks a huge hook that staggers th BEAST BACKWARDS. As if chopping down a tree, Creed fires shot after shot i his NEMESIS, but VITOR, exhausted, tries to rally back. H staggers Adonis with his last powerful blow, which Adonis absorbs and attacks back until VITOR STUMBLES BACK and COLLAPSES THUNDEROUSLY to the canvas floor!!  109. ADONIS looks at ROCKY and GESTURES SKYWARD then CHARGES FORWARD, raising his hand IN VICTORY. ROCKY and his corner CLIMB IN to celebrate.

dialogues.speaker: INT. APPLEBEE'S RESTAURANT- NIGHT
dialogues.text: The CROWD applauds and several of ROBERT'S ACQUAINTANCES compliment him and LOGAN. He watches the IMAGE of ADONIS hugging BIANCA and ROCKY. ROBERT finally smiles and gestures towards the TV.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: Special, huh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drago GLARES at Vitor and shakes his head in DISGUST.

dialogues.speaker: RING ANNOUNCER
dialogues.text: (in Russian) Winner at 2:21 of the tenth round: Adonis Creed! BIANCA hugs her man.

dialogues.speaker: BIANCA
dialogues.text: You were incredible! I love you!! The RING fills up with PRESS and HANGER-ONS. The SHOWTIME ANNOUNCER enters the ring and addresses Adonis.

dialogues.speaker: SHOWTIME ANNOUNCER
dialogues.text: Adonis, could we have a word with you, over here please. ROCKY sees IVAN DRAGO staring aggressively at him. ADONIS stands with ROCKY, BIANCA, ANTHONY, and PADMAN while bein interviewed.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: I wanna give a shout out to Rocky, who helped me get it back, and Bianca,

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: mother of our beautiful child, impossible to live without - And dedicate this to our father's memory - Love ya, Pops - Thank you. It's been a lot of hell, but worth it!  110. BIANCA kisses him and the scene fades.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The FANS are now dispersing into the cold night air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ADONIS TEAM has loaded up the SUVS and are preparing leave. ADONIS and BIANCA stand in the snow.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: C'mon, Unc - ADONIS gets into the SUV. ROCKY exits, carrying his GYM BAG. He starts down the HAL and pauses. He backtracks around the CORNER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slightly open locker room door. ROCKY looks in and sees VITOR, beaten and facing the wall MORALLY DEFEATED, ASHAMED. ROCKY pushes the door open a touch more and sees DRAGO wi his hand on his son's shoulder, quietly consoling him. ADONIS silently steps into view behind ROCKY. DRAGO feels their presence and turns, almost embarrassed. rises and unnervingly approaches. VIOLENCE appears inevitable. Inches apart, ROCKY and DRAGO lock eyes for a heavy momen ADONIS is on alert. At the last moment, ROCKY averts his eyes and directs his vision to the defeated son, VITOR. DRAGO too slowly turns and looks at his son, then refaces ROCKY. The meaning is clear. It's Over. Help your only so ROCKY steps back and closes the door.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Yo... Ya did pretty good.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: (laughs) ».. Vicious enough?  111.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: I've see it done better.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: By who? You?

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Absolutely.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: Know what's cool? Growin' old gracefully.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: +.. But ungracefully is more fun.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: I wouldn't know.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: ++. You will. ROCKY walks with ADONIS into the night. FADE OUT.
